13513121212112111211121211.content:
Soon the machine completed its work, and Slave #45787 found herself surrounded by newly completed Badniks. Catching a reflection in a particularly shiny surface, she noted that she had been placed inside a caterkiller type Badnik.

It was not her place to question Master's decision, and so she accepted this without issue. Clearly she would be most useful in this form, or Master would not have ordered it.

The Badniks began to move off, Slave #45787 for some reason enjoying the particularly slow and laboured movements of the Badnik.

Slave #45787 starts to feel useless to her Master, since there's no-one to hunt.
135131212121121112111212112.content:
Slave #45787 left to patrol the base, enjoying her slow crawling motions of her tomb. It occurred to her as she slithered along that she would probably be within it for a long time. After all, all of her former allies had been captured with her. They were all mindless slaves encased in Badniks now. Who else was there to oppose her Master?

Drawing a blank on that, she continued her crawling, and relaxed further into the cosy Caterkiller. She was safe now. She would be comfortable and captive forever. With no-one to fight Master, she could never be set free.And even if there was a token resistance to him, they would never encroach far enough into Master's territory to find her. The thought of permanent imprisonment appealed to her greatly...

1351312121211211121112121121.content:
Slave #45787 was enjoying her life inside Caterkiller. Master would often visit her, and seemed to take great delight in watching Caterkiller slowly crawl across the floor. She was pleased that she brought so much pleasure to her Master, and that he was so happy with her service.

Sometimes her Master brought new prisoners for her to play with, he would watch as Caterkiller slowly chased them around, until eventually they were herded into the Badnik processing machine. This was always a real thrill for her, watching as another fulfilled their destiny to become a slave of her Master.

Occasionally she patrolled the base with her former friends, and she felt sure that they were as happy and comfortable as she now was.

It was the destiny of all creatures to serve her Master, she served her Master, and her Master had made her a Caterkiller.

She was Caterkiller, she served her Master, now and forever.

Sohe simply stopped, leaving Slave #45787 to do her duties alone.

After Master became bored with her, Slave #45787 spent her time slowly patrolling the base. Inside caterkiller, she was happy and content, no one could, or would ever hurt her again. She could just slowly spend her life in constant safety and comfort. Even if anyone still opposed Eggman, she knew they would not find or free her from her new home.

She no longer remembered her previous life, only now recalling her activation and patrol duties.

She was happy, she was content, she was caterkiller.

13513121212112111211121211212.content:
Humiliating the blue hedgehog was fun, that was certain. Turning him into a woman, then a bimbo, then brainwashing her into being a mindless slave, before suiting her up in an intentionally slow-moving Badnik and treating her as an incredibly slow guard dog. Occasional checks of her computer had even revealed that she thought of herself more as a Caterkiller than a hedgehog now.

Yet, as amusing as it was... it was a tremendous waste of a good slave. Sonic had been extremely powerful foe, and Slave #45787 could be a very powerful ally, if she had a better body... And the entertainment factor was beginning to wear thin.

It was time he gave her an upgrade into a new body.

A simple egg pawn was a waste of such a powerful energy source, perhaps he could devise some sort of super egg pawn?

135131212121121112111212112121221121.content:
The girl woke with a start, what had happened to her Badnik suit?

Thoughts began to run through her head. Had she displeased Master? Had she been captured?

Most of all she missed the comfort and security of her Badnik shell, and the sure knowledge that she was serving her Master.

Her room was comfortable enough, but still she began to panic, she had to return to Master, she must become a Badnik again!

She tried the door to her room, and found it opened easily. Stepping outside, her panic began to subside when she spotted Badniks moving past in the corridor. All was not lost!

A Eggpawn stopped and addressed her in a metallic rasping voice. "Slave, why are you not carrying out your orders?"

She admitted to the robot that she did not have any orders currently, and only wanted to serve Master again. The Eggpawn spoke "You have no skills or talents, solution: badnik conversion."

The Eggpawn then escorted her through another door, and onto a production line. Once again the machinery whirled, and soon she found herself crammed inside another Badnik, this time a Spikes.

The Badnik returned to her former room, and began to wait. Inside the Badnik the former hero was once again happy and content, she settled down in her new home.

Eventually Eggman entered the room, and expecting to find a hedgehog girl, was surprised to see a Spikes Badnik. He laughed quietly to himself, quickly working out what had happened.

Eggman was not concerned, as this did not effect his plans.

"Slave, listen to your Master." Eggman commanded. She paused, then looked adoringly at the rotund dictator. "Over there is your new armour: The Super Eggpawn. You are to put it on and use it to serve me. Your days as a mindless drone are over, it is time you put your power to good use."

A red metal corset wrapped around her body, pushing up her breasts. It had the golden buttons and white central stripe of her Master's uniform, and a domed shell, red with black spots, fixed to the back of the suit. Small rocket boosters attached to the shell, increasing her already great speed and agility. Red spherical pauldrons encased her shoulders. Black gauntlets slid up to her upper arms, while red metal armguards locked around her forearms, with retracting blades resembling the basic Badnik's claws on them.

Finally, it added the headgear.

13513121212112111211122222.content:
Slave #45787 found herself on a conveyer belt, being pushed along. She stood at attention, arms by her sides, as it carried her deeper into the workings of the machine. SHe made no effort to move or resist, she couldn't comprehend that idea anymore.

"Dissolving clothing." A soothing voice spoke up, as she passed through an arch with a red glow contained inside it, and felt her uniform melt off of her body, leaving her naked on the belt. She shivered involuntarily- It was colder than she expected, but she otherwise remained still. It carried her through a door, and a metal helmet descended, latching onto her head. It encircled her whole head, electrodes sticking to her temples, and she heard he voice again. "Scanning subject's mind..."

Slave #45787 felt a faint tingling from the electrodes, which spread through her numb mind. She remained still, not reacting to it.

"Subject's mind already blanked." Yes... her mind was already gone, washed away and dulled into mindless obedience to her Master. And soon, she would be ready to serve him properly. If she'd still had opinions and emotions of her own, she would've been excited. As it was, she waited dutifully. "Skipping Stage 2, progressing to Stage 3... "

1351312122111111112111212.content:
Sophia wasn't sure how long she'd been working. A few years before, Master had ordered a total memory wipe. She knew that she had been active before then, she could tell from the minor corrections in her code that could only be made through trial and error, so she guessed that she had previously held memories that Master had use for, and they had become irrelevent after the fact.

Curiously, the day of her new first memories seemed to be Victory Day, a national holiday for all non-robotic members of the Empire. The day of Master's great conquest of the rest of the planet.

She remembered being reassigned to Maid Team FF, where she worked with her new colleagues, a golden vixen, a pink hedgehog, a brown squirrel, a yellow rabbit, a tan lynx, a brown coyote, and a purple walrus. All of them were identical to her in all ways except their heads, and the vixen's twin tails. They seemed to be odd features for a vixen to have, but Master ensured her that it was nothing to be concerned over.

Her body had been modified again. Like her Team, she had her feet removed and replaced with hover engines. According to Master, it was so they wouldn't walk over already-clean areas, but even so, he seemed to take an unusual amount of delight in removing her feet in particular.

Those first memories were ten years old now. That's what her chronometer told her, anyway. She had been cleaning almost non-stop ever since. She would pause for maintenance, but otherwise, she continued to clean. Sometimes she brought Master his food, but mostly, she cleaned. She mopped, dusted, scrubbed, unclogged, brushed, swept, buffed, polished, vacuumed, and used many other methods too. She smiled all the while, because Sophia the Maidbot lived to serve, clean, and obey her Master.

He took time to appreciate the natural surroundings, and at times, he dash around the wooded area for exercise. After about an hour, he decided to head back home in the city. He then got out of the woods and into a small plain that leads back to a small suburb which is just right next to the city.

He then decided to walk some ways in the plains. When reached the half way point of it, he spotted a black box. He approached it curiously. "What could be in it?" he said to no one in particular. He then picked it up with both hands and took off the lid. Sonic was surprised to see that it was a remote control! Then he began to examine it more. Sonic immediately saw the source of the song--a mermaid laying on a large stone and singing while playing a harp-like instrument. Sonic floated there, waiting in awe. 15123111121211211111111.content:
The vicar got started, and to be honest, neither bride nor groom really listened to him. The were too busy focusing on each other. A mere month go, they had been bitter rivals. Now some magic fruit and some ill-advised sex later, Sonic had become Saria, the ebon hedgehog's blushing bride-to-be, and she loved it. Her heart swelled every time she looked at him, especially knowing that, within the year, they would be parents. Spending time with him had been a wonderful experience, and despite his emotional issues, he'd quickly become a real romantic. In truth, she found her month-long life as his lovely bride more fulfilling than a lifetime of running could ever be. She'd always run, never staying in one place for long, because she felt like something was missing, something didn't fit. But now, it did fit. It fit perfectly.

Shadow, meanwhile, was happier than he had ever been. He'd never expected to experiece love, and he had to admit, the place it came from was rather unexpected. Their hook-up had hardly been romantic, just drunken sex on a night that changed the course of Sonic's life forever. He remembered Tails and Knuckles being female that night too, but they had returned to normal next morning. If not for his presence at the bar, Sonic would still be Sonic. But once he'd impregnated her, she was Saria for life. It couldn't have gone better for him. He at first feared that he might be selfish, that he might be ruining Sonic's life by trapping him in the form of a busty, pregnant woman, but Saria soon proved to be just as happy as him.

In fact, the duo had even made sure that Saria would remain female after the birth. Tails had made a machine that removed the fruit's magic from her body, ensuring that, once she was no longer with child, there would be nothing to make her male again. Her name had been legally changed, and now she was his.

The two hedgehogs gave their vows, and exchanged rings, and finally kissed, embracing tightly.

As Tails made her way back to her place to run the experiments, she noticed something odd. Nobody around her seemed to bat an eye. The most was the occasional glance from a prude or a perv over her choice of clothing, but the fact that the Twin Tailed hero was now a girl didn't seem to confuse anyone... It was like she was always that way.

Once she got to her place, she saw that her room was considerably different than before, her somewhat messy room before, now looked like it was one that belonged to a young highschooler. Of course due to the Changes, Tails found herself liking the random redecoration, although she noticed the oddity that her room was suddenly different.

She logged onto her computer, and clicked on the folder containing photos from her life to test her theory. Sure enough, they all had her, Sonic, and Knuckles in them... but every single photo was them as girls, doing their normal world saving duties, but also spending time together like standard girls. "Whatever happened must have had some sort of Reality Alteration Power that changed the world, changed everything around us to make this the truth.... What kind of Tree did Sonic get those fruits from?"

As she pondered everything the door to her place opened and Sonic came in wearing something more stylish than her bikini from before.

Sonic felt queasy at the suddenness of it all. One moment, he'd been walking into a shoe store, hoping to get a new pair of sneakers, maybe an upgrade in quality. Now he was staring at himself in the huge, ornate mirror of some fancy girly clothing store's massive changing room, naked save for a pair of high heels that would have made Amy laugh.

Face stretched and eyes wide in empty Barbie-doll smile, he placed one limp-wristed hand on his hip and struck a pose that belonged in Vogue. Sexy little nothings purring from his throat, he puckered his lips and leaned forward to show off non-existent cleavage, eyelids resting in a sultry half-open as he blew a kiss to make any woman roll her eyes. Sonic's heart dropped even further into his stomach, its beat increasing with his panic.

Take off the shoes and walk away. Take off the shoes and walk away.Sonic repeated the self-command, putting as much emphasis as possible on every syllable. To his complete surprise, he broke his sexy come-hither pose, walking over to the changing room's bench. Trying not to think about how expertly he had rolled his hips as he strutted to the bench, or how femininely he was crossing his legs as he sat down, Sonic continued his mantra, inner voice growing fast with hope. Take off the shoes-

Sonic felt himself slip off the left shoe, the coquettish motion accompanied by the feeling of all of the bows and ruffles of the shoe brushing against his foot. He could have screamed with joy. A shift in position, and then the right shoe was off as well, neatly set aside with the other member of the outrageous pair.

Walk away, walk away, walk away. Sonic's repetition was reaching a fever pitch, his thoughts blurring together. He could taste the freedom, the masculinity, all just waiting beyond the changing room door. He could deny the stories if anyone said they saw him. He could do whatever he need to do, if he could just get out of this hellish nightmare of a mall.

Sonic felt himself stand up again, rising quickly and lightly to stand in front of the mirror. Trying to ignore the feminine shoulder and hand posture he immediately assumed, he slowed the pace of his thoughts but increased their volume, putting more force into every word of his begging prayer.

He struck a new pose, resting one hand on his hip and letting the other stroke his quills. Chest stuck out in sharp contrast to his drawn-back shoulders and rear, he fluttered his eyelids, announcing his self-satisfaction with a girly little purr of a "Mmhmm..."

The mantra was spiraling out of control, words blurring together and volume at a horrified high. Please walk away, please walk away. When he began to move, Sonic, for the slightest moment, felt another great surge of hope. When he realized where he was moving to, he felt an overwhelming urge to vomit.

Heels tapping on the imitation marble floor with each step, he moved towards his pile of recently-acquired clothing. The movement itself caused Sonic's insides to go cold as he delicately placed each foot in front of the other with each little mincing step, causing him to wiggle in places he'd rather be still. Once again assuming his kissy face, he glanced over his shoulder and appreciated himself in the mirror, placing one hand on his hip while the other ran up his thigh and rear in a caressing motion that made him want to scream.

With a swiftness and certainty that made him wince, Sonic reached into the pile and pulled out the panties. He could feel bile in his throat at the sight of the frilly pink mass resting in his hand. Before he could further regret his situation, Sonic bent over and stepped into the ruffle-and-lace nightmare of women's underwear, pulling the panties up so quickly and decisively that Sonic could only mentally yelp in shock at the sensation of his privates being forcefully compressed.

They were somehow even worse when worn. The ruffles, protruding noticeably in lines of delicate ballet pink, were laid over a base of slightly darker pink lace. A silk bow, several size, rested at the very top of the panties' rear, completing the image of incredibly-sexually-active-yet-still-a-sickeningly-ladylike-princess that the undergarment was going for. It must have been padded, because his rear and hips now looked several times larger, able to give Rouge a run for her money in the curves department.

Sonic felt like crying, stomach knotted and frigid with the most extreme terror he'd ever felt. It certainly didn't help then that, after briefly modelling the panties with a gleeful strut, he returned to the pile of clothing and selected the matching padded bra. Having an unwanted imitation of the most obvious sign of femininity made Sonic's blood run cold. Despite the numbness, tried again to reason with himself. Stop it, oh god stop it, please just take it all off.

Uncaring, Sonic donned the bra, staring downward at the pair of mounds just large enough to suggest a modestly flat chest. Turning to the mirror, he caressed the new garment, testing its shape and feeling with his hands and arms, each movement accompanied by another little appreciative murmur. At the sight of his obvious arousal with the frilly horror, Sonic began to beg with new fear. Take it off, off, now, please-

Next, as evidenced by the certainty of his motion, where the stockings. The opaque, delicate little things, limp in his hand as he sat down and bunched them up, turned Sonic's pleas to panicked nonsense. They stretched gently past his foot and calf, stopping at upper thigh and turning his legs into white porcelain. Lace surrounded the edges, a delicate white to his panties' suggestive pink.

For a moment, he paused, sitting with complete stillness as the noises of the busy store outside leaked into the room. Oh god, yes, please, stop, please. Sonic's thoughts, broken and jittery from the cycle of hope and despair, managed to solidify for another pseudo-prayer as he got up and sashayed towards the center of the massive room, not even pausing to look in the mirror. The plea grew desperate as the sashay continued past the center of the room and to the door.

Opening the door with a gentle turn of the handle, Sonic stepped out into the hallway minced towards the changing room attendant. When the attendant looked up from her book, she went from surprise and confusion to professional courtesy in a second. "How may I assist you, ma'am?"

Doll-smile stretching with childish glee, Sonic played with his quills and batted his eyelashes as he drawled in a voice that could only be described as hyper-feminine. "Hi, I, like, need to try on a corset, but, like, can't tie it? I feel really really silly but I don't know, like, how to do it?" Sonic's urge to vomit returned in full force.

"Of course, ma'am, I'd be delighted to help." the woman returned with him to the room, clearly amused by the strange sight in front of her. During the short walk, Sonic engaged in nonstop small-talk, filling his already half-coherent thoughts with darling, sweetie, and soooo pretty as he strutted and sashayed, gesticulating with his hands in a way that made Sonic want to stab himself with the stiletto heels of the shoes that started all of this.

As they began the long and arduous process of lacing the corset, Sonic's begging once again devolved into nonsense, now just a general plea to stop this torture before it went any farther, only quieting when the corset tightening began. It was like being stuck between collapsing walls, forcing your bones into positions they would have never otherwise considered. When it was done, his breathing was so high and light he doubted he could run so much as a hundred meters without passing out.

The corset itself was a work of art in torture. Starting at the top of his panties and reaching up to forcefully position his fake bust, it was a gleaming hourglass of light pink leather and white frills. The attached garters, delicate lace-edged things, hooked into his stockings and forced them up higher on his legs, making him feel compressed in every area except for his head. The corset's laces rested at his lower back in a petite bow on top of the corset's attached and frill-laden bustle.

Thanking the attendant, he began to prance around, blowing kisses to the mirror. He looked like a fairy princess. No, a fairy bride, excited in her wedding lingerie. The thought made his begging start anew. Turning to the attendant (who really was trying her best not to burst out laughing), he struck a pose. "Am I, like, soooo pretty?" The answer was immediate. "Oh, very pretty, ma'am. I think the boys are going to go crazy over you."

Sonic wanted to die, and the feeling only grew stronger as he started to put on the dress. It was a nightmare of a gown, gigantic puffy-spherical shoulders ending with white-laced sleeves, bust as tight and revealing as possible, rear adorned with a massive pink silk bow, the fabric of the dress squeezing his body like a mermaid gown until his knees, where it exploded out in a mess of frilly underskirts. The attendant helped him with the clasps in the back, complimenting his figure. She helped him put his heels back on, and then, at last, it was done.

The sight in the mirror turned Sonic's thoughts into a sobbing mess. Looking like himself until his chin, and then becoming a fairy princess out of some fairy tale, reminded him of just how severe the difference was.

"Oh, my, god. It is all so, like, darling. I'll take it all." Sonic gave her the one thing the had left from before all of this- his credit card he had brought to buy new shoes. The attendant's eyes lit up with the prospect of the commission she would get from the sale. "Oh, sweetie, I am, like, going to totally wear this out of here! Thank you so much!"

In a few minutes, Sonic was standing outside of the changing room, dressed in a pink nightmare. If he could, he would have screamed.
15222111221.title: Sonic dresses himself in the new outfit.

choices: Sonic gets some extremely girly accessories.
The "Fairy Princess Bride" wants her wings and tiara...
1522211122111.content:
Sonic stood transfixed, staring at himself in the mirror. His thoughts a barely-coherent mess, pleas and prayers for release from this torture intermingling with the giggles, coos, and other feminine outbursts... though they could hardly be called outbursts with how they completely controlled him now.

And yet, even with the completion of his nightmarish new attire, he had no control over himself, and worse yet, the bizarre mind running his body on autopilot didn't seem remotely satisfied. Even more horrifying thoughts kept splashing across his desperate begging for release- She wanted makeup, she wanted hair-style, she wanted other things that didn't bare mentioning, but currently, she seemed most focused on accessories. Sonic wasn't quite sure what that meant, outside of the usual gloves, most girls he knew didn't seem to focus on that much. Sure, Amy had her hairband, and Fiona had her bow- Thinking of the vixen's oddly-cute ribbon seemed to excite the autopilot, and judging from the bows on his boots, on his panties, and on his dress, it wasn't hard to see why- but otherwise, he didn't really know much about it.

The store assistant soon returned, and handed Sonic his card, smiling. Any amusement she had for the hedgehog's attitude seemed to have evaporated now, and she seemed more grateful to him for adding a hefty amount to her paycheck for the month.

"Like, do you have accessories here?" His voice asked needily.

"I'm afraid not." She said. "There's a great store that does just down the nearest escalator outside, though."

"Mmm, great, like, thank you!" He beamed, curtseying involuntarily. With that, he turned on his high-heel and began to strut out of the store. His new attire emphasised his swaying hips even more, and inside, he just wanted to die of embarrassment, especially when he left the store and happily made his way down the escalator.

The girl-mind beamed with excitement as she spotted the store through his eyes, and almost skipped there, if not for the tightness of the dress around his legs. Instead, his body strutted gracefully into the store, and began to peruse their shelves...
1522211122111.title: Accessories

15222111221111.content:
Sonic focused every atom of his sense of self (what was left, at least) into making his rebellious body stand still and end the sensation of the dress's silken cloth rubbing against his pantied rear. The fact that he seemed to be hellbent on strutting and prancing like a possessed backup dancer was making it hard, but he persisted, even when it struck him that his current motion was carefully designed to make it seem like he wanted the other customers staring at his unfortunately feminine new look, maybe even checking out how his hips rolled and how the tightness of the dress accentuated his sweet a—.

With the mental equivalent of a scream, Sonic snapped himself out of a feminine trance. What the hell was going on? Surely he had to be dreaming; there was no way any of this was real. Before he could try to convince himself further, Sonic realized what his body was doing.

Giggling to himself with girlish glee, Sonic was limpwristedly perusing an incredibly diverse selection of handbags. To his absolute horror, he found himself ignoring anything that wasn't both pink and ludicrously covered in bows, frills, pearls, or any disgusting combination of the three. Several potential handbags and a few clutches had already been selected and set aside, all of varying sizes and shapes but united by almost blindingly bright shades of pink. With a squeal of joy Sonic found himself reaching behind the modest, respectable items and retrieving what he could only describe as a monstrosity. It had to be the least efficient, most ridiculous looking thing he had ever seen. Frills seemed to pour off of the edges, and the hints of princess-pink leather that peeked through the ruffled, lacy decorations were bedazzled with glittery hearts. An oversized satin bow, patterned with sequined kiss marks, hid the handbag's clasp. Disgust and fury mingling in his throat, Sonic's face lit up in a smile, a disgustingly adorable little coo squeaking from his lips in appreciation.

Still carrying all of the other bags and clutches for some reason, Sonic slipped the abomination of a handbag over his shoulder and started to mince off towards the nearest employee, a young fox whose boredom was so severe that she looked like she had been at her desk for the better part of a week. Her genuine double take made Sonic shiver in disgust, his masculinity wounded in an entirely new way when she held her hand over her mouth to stifle a laugh. "Thank you for visiting Haute Couture Boutique... ma'am." the hesitation gave Sonic the distinct feeling that, while there was a chance he could be seen as male even in his ridiculous dress, common courtesy required that it was never going to take place. "How may I be of assistance?"

Help. Please. "Oh, you are such, like, a cute little girl," Sonic could see the hatred flash in the fox's eyes as he flailed his hands in what he feared was an attempt at friendliness. Little girl? She was clearly in her late teens. What the hell was she—no, HE—trying to do to himself? "Sweetie, I could just eat you up, I swear." The fox coughed, glancing at the items covering Sonic's arms, her patience clearly wearing thin with the ridiculous sight before her.

"Oh, right. Aren't these just the cutest? I want to buy, like, all of these." Sonic thought for a moment that his body had actually allowed his twitching anger to gain control, but he quickly realized it was actually his changing from ridiculous pose to another as he showed off the worst of the pink horrors. "This one is so, sooooo pretty." The fox's stare shifted up from the purse back to Sonic's smiling face. For a moment, Sonic could see the full extent of her confusion and disquiet, but to his horror it melted away into professional courtesy.

"Of course, ma'am. How would you like to pay, cash or card?" Sonic tried to clench his teeth in involuntary panic when he realized what was going to happen. He couldn't afford any of this.

"Oh, card. I'm not very good at, like, counting..." Sonic tried to zone out the rest of the small talk that took place as the fox placed all of the selected handbags and clutches (except, to Sonic's disappointment, his squeal-marked favourite, which he proudly wore on his shoulder) in a pink shopping bag bearing the store's logo, but his will broke when he heard himself start asking for more fashion assistance. It had been so many minutes of boring purse-browsing that he had nearly forgotten his previous glimpse of the girl-mind's other desires. Fear spread like fire through his nerves, but not so much as a twitch escaped to the outside world.

"Yes, ma'am, we carry a wide variety of gloves. Do you have a particular item in mind?" Sonic dreaded the answer, but when it came he was still surprised by how genuine his voice sounded. "I want them, like, long? And pink? Or white?" a giggle escaped from his lips as Sonic found himself placing one hand on his frilly pink hip and gesticulating with the other. "I think we'll be able to accommodate you, ma'am. If you'll follow me," the fox stood up from her desk and began to move into the heart of the store. The sight of her outfit, a utilitarian black pantsuit, left Sonic feeling—to his disgust when he realized what he was wishing he could wear an undeniably female outfit—envious of her relative gender neutrality.

Any wish on Sonic's part to find some less extravagant clothing was dashed when they reached the gloves. There were only a few pairs on display, the majority of them feminine but not truly horrible. There was, however, a pair of evening gloves near the end of the display, appropriately labelled "Princess Collection - Pink & Flirty", that gave the rest of Sonic's outfit a run for its money. The fox was telling him that they were the finest stretch satin, and that their delicate pink tint and lace decoration would compliment his dress, but all Sonic could focus on were the bows, two little satin pieces of horrible pink that rested on the wrists of the gloves and topped the built-in lace cuffs.

Before Sonic could begin to feel the full extent of his hatred towards this newest offense, his attention was drawn by the fox to the hem of the gloves and the elaborate floral lace designs. Sonic's feeling of sickness jumped up a few notches when he heard himself coo and purr in delight as he stepped up to the gloves and began to inspect the details of their femininity. A few moments later, and Sonic found himself wearing the twin pink horrors, moving his limp wrists in a way that eerily reminded him of a stereotypical princess. Their exorbitant cost was immediately added to the growing list of new debts.

The trip to the perfume counter only took a few moments, but Sonic wasn't sure if he should be thankful about it; he had squealed over the fox's explanations and advice to run forward and select a pink glittery bottle labelled "Pink Sugar Dolly Girl: Flirtatious Chiffon". Sonic's numbness only increased as they continued to the jewelry counter and began to examine the glittering gemstone novelties. Pearls, necklaces and matching earrings were inspected and either accepted or rejected based on how noticeably expensive they were. After what seemed hours of indecision, he finally settled on a glitter-pink choker connected to a large heart-shaped pink gemstone that rested delicately over, and nearly completely hid, his adam's apple. The matching earrings, also heart shaped, were worn after a few minutes of piercing (it was easily the least painful thing to happen to him all day). He decided to be conservative, to his relief, and only bought two of the many different pearl necklaces that caught his attention, selecting childish pink and classical white at the suggestion of the fox.

After yet another round of payments, the financial pain now just another dull thud in his now omnipresent headache, Sonic stood in front of one of the store's many mirrors and struck a series of poses. The fox, still weary but visibly excited by the commissions she had to look forward to, complimented every swing of the hip and pursing of the lips. Sonic was starting to doubt that any nightmare could last this long, or feel this horribly real.

"So, like, are there any good places for a makeover around here? I think I need to try something new..." the fox smiled politely, her forthcoming answer clearly a matter of routine. "Of course. There is a beauty store that specializes in cosmetics and hairdressing, Sweetie's Salon, just a small walk away. In fact, I believe they specialize in makeovers, although I must warn you, they're a little expensive. If you just continue down the way and make a right, you can't miss it." Sonic curtsied in thanks, making the fox giggle, and then set off.
15222111221111.title: Sonic gets some extremely girly accessories.

choices: ... main area. The penultimate changes begin in earnest.
... waiting room. Sonic discovers women's magazines.
152221112211111.content:
As Sonic half-strut, half-skipped out the store, the female mind cooed with the delight. With the overload of shopping choices behind her, she'd become much more focused again. During these trips, it was harder than usual for Sonic to get a thought in edgewise, no matter how hard he tried. All he could do was listen to the stream of giggles and coos and squeals as they coalesced into terrifying planning and plotting once again.

He realised that she was starting to check off her makeover's progress as she walked. Shoes, check. Clothes, check. Bags, check. Gloves, check. Jewels, check. Perfume, check. Just makeup, hair, and her body to go!

Sonic screamed internally when he heard that giggle. Thinking of it as shoes, clothes, accessories, makeup, hair, and whatever 'body' meant (He had his suspicions, and he didn't like it), at least sounded like it was only half-way done. Separating "Accessories" into its constituent parts made it clear that the makeover was on the home stretch. This store was going to be the last one before his "Makeover" was complete, and whatever crazy idea for giving him a female body came into play.

If there was any small light in this, it was that, with any luck,he might have control again after this hellish day was over...


Sonic entered the salon, feeling a little relief as her female half once again dissolved into the distracted buzz of excitement.


"Hello, Ma'am, how may I help you today?" The woman at the desk spoke up to him. She was a cute hyena girl, face made up and hair style and cut into an adorable perm.

"Can I get, like, a full makeover! I wanna be super-cute!"

"You certainly can, Ma'am. Have a seat." She said, gesturing to a chair in the...
152221112211111.title: To the Salon

1522211122111112.content:
"Oh thank you dearie," Sonic purred, his limp, gloved hand flapping daintily at the hyena as she stared at the hedgehog in mixed amusement and confusion. "I am, like, so excited for my new look..."

Sonic tried his hardest to ignore the exaggerated, come-hither swaying of his padded hips as he minced into the waiting room, but the strut-synchronised clicks of his stiletto heels on the salon's tile flooring was making it very difficult. With every sensualized step the sound pounded into his head, underscoring the limpwristed swinging of his arms and forcing him to stay conscious of the nightmare that his day had become. When I find out who did this, there's going to be-

Sonic's thoughts were interrupted by an ungodly squeal of excitement shivering up from his throat. His body had just noticed one of the several monstrous pink rose bouquets that filled the waiting room, and was now prancing over to it with a particularly swishy gait. As he screamed with frustration internally, Sonic found himself bending over until he was completely horizontal past the hip, face buried in the roses. Breathing the nauseating fragrance of the flowers at this close of a distance made Sonic's thoughts go hazy, and it took him a few moments to realize what his body was doing.

As the silken material of his dress stretched extremely tight across the padded curves of his suggestively positioned derriere, he was still slowly swinging his hips to some silent beat, clearly putting on a show. It was who the show was for that worried him most of all. Glancing back coyly, one hand still stroking the rose against his cheek, Sonic fluttered his eyelashes. A masseur, just walking out of the adjacent hallway's many doors, stared back in mixed bewilderment and thinly-veiled revulsion. Sonic's heart clenched in his chest as he mentally screamed for his body to resist whatever was forcing it to act like a sex-starved drag queen. As he did so, his free hand slowly ran up his thigh to rest on his now even more suggestively swaying rear, rubbing the silken material of the dress with a gentle caress before lightly squeezing it. A soft little purr of pleasure rose from Sonic's throat as he gently kissed the rose.

The blushing masseur, eyes widening in shock and disgust before being averted, quickly set off down the hallway. Sonic, giggling to himself like the contented little flirt his body apparently desired to be (while his mind reeled in shock at this glimpse of the horror his body had in store for him), quickly straightened up and turned around. The hyena receptionist stared at him from beyond the doorway, eyes as wide as the masseur's. Apparently satisfied with his scandilizing of the staff, Sonic gathered his skirts in preparation for sitting down.

Sonic, to his mixed despair and rage, found the motion somehow even worse than the prissy mincing of his new style of walking. Sitting in the dress was a careful matter of daintily smoothing out the rear, positioning the bow, and then, after everything else was prepared in the most prim and delicate way imaginable, lightly lowering himself into the seat and crossing his legs. Sonic had nothing against crossing his legs normally, and had never even really thought about it before, but something was changed. The sensation of stockinged legs, rubbing against each other and the dress that ensheathed them, was an inescapable reminder of what his body had done to itself. It didn't help that his legs seemed to always be in slight motion, forcing the arousing sensation to stay ever-present in his mind as he assumed poses that he could only hope he would never find himself assuming again.

After a few moments of just staring at the salon's decoration while daintily fussing with the roses, Sonic found his eyes involuntarily drawn to a laminated sheet of paper resting on a chair to his left. He hadn't even completed the first sentence before a mental groan of anguish filled his head (only, of course, to be promptly and completely ignored) as he pressed his hands to his cheeks in sheer and unadulterated glee.

When the hyena receptionist finally walked over to Sonic, he was still engrossed in the contents of the single piece of paper, eyes glittering with joy as he invisibly begged for release from the torture that was coming.

"Oh. My. God. I had no idea you were, like, a spa! I just have to have the full package, honey. It's definitely time I had a real makeover. I need to be like, sooooo pretty. Ohmigod I'm so excited!"

The hyena nodded and smiled as Sonic prattled on. He could have sworn he saw gold coins flash in her eyes for a split second. Was that the sound of a cash register? "Of course, ma'am! It will be just a few more minutes while we get the World Class Experience ready for you. Please, enjoy a magazine while you wait, I'll be back shortly!" With that, she was gone.

Sonic, almost squealing with a glee that terrified him, put every ounce of will he had left into imagining himself running out the salon's ridiculous doors. When he gave up and focused back on the nightmare that his day had become, he was holding a magazine, no doubt snatched from one of the nearby tables covered with piles of them.
The cover alone filled Sonic with the urge to vomit. Never, no matter the consequences, would he have let himself be seen dressed as some hideous fairy tale nightmare, reading the newest copy of...
1522211122111112.title: ... waiting room. Sonic discovers women's m...

15222111221111121.content:
Coquette Quarterly wasn't exactly advanced reading. Mocked by most women and read by those who never mentally graduated past the "i love cute clothes and cute boys!!! teehee!!!" phase, Sonic knew of its existence only because he had once heard Vanilla forbid Cream to ever read it. She had been talking about something to do with inappropriate content and the enforcement of "patriarchal" gender roles. The cover, an image of a disquietingly eager looking young echidna woman dressed in a pink Playboy Bunny costume and surrounded by two questionably older (and questionably clad) male hedgehogs, told Sonic that she had been more than right to do just that.

Sonic tried his hardest to zone out from this parodically-feminine nightmare, desperately searching for anything to let him ignore the hell his life had become. It wasn't very successful, and after a moment trying his hardest to think of the running shoes he had intended to buy before the nightmare began, he found his attention being forced back to the pages in front of him.

Perched delicately over his crossed legs, pages held as if they could cut his precious little gloves, Sonic was greeted with a centerfold extravaganza of lewdness. Unrealistic, inappropriate, and uncomfortably erotic was the only way he could describe the depiction of male body that greeted him, but least comfortable of all was the text the accompanied the image; he had no interest in learning how to "please your man in a way that his ex never could" or "be his dirty little princess". Unfortunately for Sonic, it seemed his body disagreed. A terrifyingly aroused sounding purr tickled his throat as he ran one gloved finger down the last place he wanted to imagine touching.

I'm dreaming. It's not real. It sounded hollow, even to Sonic, but at this point it was all he had. No amount of rage or fear or sadness mattered to his body. All he had was the hope that it would be over sooner rather than later.

By the time the hyena returned to take him to his appointment, he had gone mostly numb with horror at the sheer amount of unwanted sexual response his body had generated in response to the magazine. As he gleefully rose from his seat to accompany the hyena into the heart of the salon/spa, purse daintly positioned over his crotch to hide the telltale sign of his unwanted arousal, he could only hope he wouldn't be putting any of it into practice.

"I'm sorry about that wait, ma'am, but we're finally ready to get started. Are there any concerns before we begin with the undressing?" To both Sonic's disgust and despair, the hyena seemed nearly as eager to start as his feminized body.
15222111221111121.title: Coquette Quarterly

choices: "Our best skin and fur care program. You'll feel like a princess!"
152221112211111211.content:
"Like, definitely not!" Sonic tittered like a man possessed, still carefully keeping his purse in its position as he limply flapped and gestured with his free hand in an almost frantic burst of glee. "This is going to be so great, right? Why would I want to, like, not start right now? Where can I get ready?" As he squealed out his falsetto excitement, Sonic found himself swinging his padded rear from side to side in a little happy dance that made his urge to vomit return in full force. The hyena stifled yet another laugh, hand barely able to hide the grin as she watched the dragged up hedgehog act girlier than her princess-obsessed toddler niece ever had.

Professionalism returning with a deep breath, the hyena’s forced smile returned. “If you’ll follow me, we can started right away ma’am.” she offered, almost giggling again as Sonic struck a particularly over the top pose and ran his hand down his corseted waist, before walking off into the heart of the facility.

Sonic followed close behind the hyena, the movements of his mincing strut hilarious in their exaggeration. Still seeking to keep his purse in its strategic position, he kept one hand daintily pressing the handbog into his crotch in a fashion that was anything but subtle in its attempt to hide what was going on. If anything, it may have been even more mortifying. His other hand perched limply at chest level and occassionally flapped up to give sultry little waves to the wide-eyed staff members they passed. Hips swinging wide in a come-hither strut that ended with each foot placed not merely in front but a little over the last to maximize the sensual rhythym of his steps. The incredibly distracting and infuriatingly arousing rubbing of his stockinged thighs, confined tightly in the pink prison of his dress, was just insult to injury.

Sonic had never felt more like screaming. It was all a nightmare. It had to be. The clicking of his heels on the tile floor pounded into his skull, the scent of his perfume made him want to gag, it all felt so real, but it simply wasn’t possible this was happening. How could it be? Prancing around looking like a eight year old barbie fanatic’s runway reject? Squealing his joy for the entire city to hear at the thought of a makeover? What reality could be so horrible?

Sonic’s was torn away from his thoughts by a mewling noise of mixed arousal and surprise coming from his pursed lips. The unfortunate male masseuse from before had just walked out of one of the spa rooms and into the hallway and now stood mere feet in front of them, looking uneasily at Sonic as he paused to let them get past. Sonic, to his horror, took full advantage of the opportunity. As Sonic placed his previously occupied hand on his hip and waved coyly with the other, the masseuse simultaneously paled and even turned a little green as the handbag moved to reveal just how glad the hedgehog was to see him. Sonic, trapped in his mind, felt every bit as disgusted but could only mentally sob as he brushed past the unfortunate employee, waving hand lowering to stroke the stunned man’s chest with a horrifyingly sensual delicacy. Before the man could protest or voice his discomfort, Sonic and the now very uncomfortable looking hyena woman moved on. Not before Sonic blew a kiss to the harassed man and gave him a new show of his skill in presenting his own padded rear, of course. That would have only mortified Sonic, and it was now clear that Sonic’s body wanted nothing less than absolute horror.

Sonic regained his mental composure just as they reached the undressing rooms. The hyena lead him inside to a larger room colored in soft pastels and decorated with an almost overpowering floral theme. Sonic barely even noticed the room itself as he was too busy mentally yelling in helpless anger at his own reaction. As soon as he had entered the room, he had exploded in glee. “Ohmigod, it’s so, like, pretty!” The phrase was repeated what had to be at least a dozen times as the feminized hedgehog pranced between the room’s many vases full of lilies and roses, bending over just as he had in the waiting room to both put on a show and appreciate the sickeningly strong scent. The hyena waited awkwardly until Sonic had rearranged the last vase and now stood smiling blankly, apparently now aware of why she had come in the room in the first place.

“If you’re ready to begin ma’am, I thought while you change I would walk you through the World Class Experience and get some information on how we can make it a perfect experience personalised just for you .” The hyena glanced at her clipboard before returning her gaze to the ridiculous sight in front of her. Sonic met her gaze with a mindless giggle.

“Okay! I’m a little shy, teehee...” To both his and the hyena’s horror, he began to reach for his dress’ zipper.

“M-ma’am! The dressing room is right behind you.” The hyena looked more than a little embarrassed as Sonic glanced behind him to see the extremely obvious open doorway into one of the room’s two individual dressing rooms.

“Oh. Like, okay!” Sonic chirped without a worry as he mentally sighed in relief. With another giggle, he minced inside the room and closed the door. After it swung open just as Sonic’s zipper was halfway down, the hyena very kindly reminded him to lock it as well.

“Now, our World Class Experience really is something special. We’re going to start you off with...” As the hyena began her sell of the spa/salon’s service, Sonic felt a new burst of cold, impotent rage. Why? How? As he internally cried and shouted, his body purred with satisfaction as it began to dismantle the mess of drag-barbie fashion that covered him.
152221112211111211.title: The "World Class Spa and Salon Experience" Begins

choices: Sonic goes for a full makeover, dyejob and shaving included.
For once, the new mind is more reserved, only fuelling Sonic's humiliation.
Sonic notices that his chest is looking... perkier.
1522211122111112111.content:
Skin and fur treatment. Honestly that sounded like the least awful thing that had happened to him all day at first thought. The contented murr from his bodyjacker didn't sound good, however. And nor did the clarification.

"We have a few options for the first stage, actually. We will remove the hair from your arms, front, and muzzle automatically, but there are some additional services too. Removal of back-quills is popular for a lot of hedgehog ladies like yourself, and girls without full-body fur are often interested in a neck-down shave, to make their form completely hairless below the face." The hyena spoke from the other side of the door, as Sonic carefully extracted himself from the outfit. The girly mind seemed to be taking its time to mull over these options, and it seemed quite interested in all of them, though how interested was tough to register with the excited babble.

"After that, any remaining fur is given a full wash and conditioning, to make it soft and shiny. At this stage we also like to offer fur dye treatment." Sonic felt like vomiting when his mind was immediately flooded with images of herself in a completely pink form, hairless just like Rouge from the waist down, wearing her fairytale costume with a gormless smile on her lips.

Sonic screamed internally again, but fighting the urge to refer to himself as a woman was becoming an increasingly impossible task.

That said... perhaps the dyejob wasn't such a terrible idea. After all, he was barely recognisable as a pink hedgehog. Maybe that would actually be less embarassing than his identity as Sonic being associated with the barbie-doll nightmare she was becoming. Something that Sonic was acutely aware of as her outfit gave way to his form. If there was any doubt as to the identity of the man who had strutted into the spa, acted like a slutty drag queen, and sexually harassed some poor man just trying to do his job, it would soon be gone.
1522211122111112111.title: "Our best skin and fur care program. You...

15222112.content:
Unable to stop her-himself, Sonic strutted over to an attendant and tapped her on the shoulder. She turned, and Sonic spoke in the sugariest, sweetest voice possible with male vocal chords.

"Hello Ma'am, could you perhaps help me find an outfit that will match my new shoes?"

"Oh, um, of course... Ma'am." She replied, clearly bemused. Sonic wanted to shake her head and tell her what had happened to him, but instead, his body nodded for him.

"Yes it is "Ma'am"... Or at least, it will be very soon!" That didn't sound good.

"Well then, what sort of girl are you, Ma'am?" She asked, smiling a little more now.
15222112.title: Sonic asks an attendant for help choosing a sui...

choices: These ones are still for girls, but a bit less ridiculous.
They're just as overly girly as the last pair!
152222.content: Seemingly satisfied with the results, the machine lifted Sonic from the heels, and for a moment, he thought he was free. But then the machine packed the pair into a box, put the box in a bag, and placed it beside him, before bringing in another pair.
152222.title: It tries on more shoes

1522222.content: Sonic said as the machine tried on even fancier heels on his feet. This would continue for the next few hours as the machine tried on thirty different pairs on Sonic's feet. Afer the machine was done Sonic was left barefoot with the bags of shoes next to him. Hey are you going to give me back my normal shoes! He said as he looked at the bag of shoes.

152331.content:
For some unknown reason, Sonic went into the story. He decided to try on a piece of clothing for pregnant women and then passed out for a little while.

When he woke up, he find out out not only he is now female, but also pregnant. Of course this freaks out Sonic, but tries to calm herself because of the child inside of herself.

1541222121222211112.content:
Sonic, or rather, Sophia, woke up in her bed. It was now two years since she had been captured and transformed into a girl, and her body had recovered from the experiment, and, with some healthy physical therapy and exercise, she had blossomed into an attractive, eighteen year-old woman.

Her marriage to Shadow had come quickly, and, along with Rouge, he had been helping her adjust to her new life.They had chosen the name Sophia together, and Rouge had helpfully instructed Sonic on fashion and makeup and all of that.

Initially, she had scoffed at all of that, from the wedding to the tips and the attempts to change her name and make her embrace her new body. She'd been kidnapped and used for some weird experiment that made her a female and forced her to plop out ten babies that were immediately taken from her. And yet, the long she spent as a girl, the more she began to feel at home in her new body. The more she was dragged on shopping trips and forced into salons, the more she enjoyed herself. The cosmetic changes had come piece by piece. First, her use of makeup steadily increased. She went from not using any, to using tiny amounts, to applying more and more, until she used just as much as Rouge. Rarely did she go out without her lipstick and eyeshadow. She even took to doing her nails, despite them always being covered. Then she began using perfume. Then her dress sense changed, gone were the tomboyish outfits of her early days, and instead, she wore dresses and skirts and blouses and even some rather sexual clothes. The colours went from her normal reds and neutral greys, whites, and blacks to more vibrant- Pinks, purples, yellows, greens to match her eyes. Her running shoes got girlier, then got heels, and soon she was wearing stiletto-healed boots, which, with Rouge's help, she learned to walk perfectly in.

Then, one day, she did it. SHe gave up her iconic quills, having them restyled into long, soft hair, that was useless for fighting robots. SHe went out alone, and came back with all the documenation saying that her name was now Sophia, and did the one thing she could never have seen herself doing: She gave up heroism. Realising that she no longer enjoyed running outside of the gym, that her usual attire was useless for fighting, and her quills were no longer a weapon, she told her friends that her powers no longer mattered to her, and they were pointless.

So, with a GUN device that had been made for use on enemies, Rouge drained away Sophia's powers. She was no nothing more than an ordinary girl. She began dating Shadow, and soon found herself accepting his proposal. They were married the very next week.

That was two years ago now, and Sophia sat up, stretching with a sigh of...

15412221212222111121.content:
Despite already had ten children, Sophia hadn't been allowed to keep them. The circumstances of their birth had led to the scientists keeping them and fostering them out once the experiments were done. Sophia hadn't complained at the time, but as her new mindset began to form, she realised that she actually rather liked the idea of children. Shadow insisted on not jumping in early, and so it had taken them almost two years to conceive, but eventually, Sophia got her wish. Now she rested on her bed, rubbing her hands over the swollen stomach.

Sophia got up from her bed carefully, and slowly padded over to her floor length mirror, twirling a lock of blue hair idly as she admired her beautiful form. She let out a giggle as she imagined what her sixteen year old self would've thought of the new her. That adventurous free spirit, never allowing himself to be tied down, always on the move, always fighting, somehow becoming a demure and dutiful housewife- Shadow's salary from GUN was more than enough to support them. Sometimes, Rouge joked about the idea of the GUN doctors specifically tampering with her mind to make her docile and submissive, but even though the idea seemed plausible, Sophia couldn't bring herself to care. In fact, if she had been brainwashed, she wanted to meet the one who did it to thank him personally! She had gone from a restless and wild existence to a content and luxurious lifestyle.

A kick from the baby roused her from her thoughts, and Sophia entered the bathroom to run herself a bath.

He approached the fence and peeked through one of the holes.

What he saw was an old fashioned well with a wooden crank and bucket, and a stone cylinder base and opening. On the ground, next to the well looked like some kind of coin. Curious about this, Sonic tried to move one of the posts to see if it opens and luckily, one did. He went through the hole and closed it. He discovered that he was in a four-way like intersection spot with fences blocking the exits. He looked back on the ground and picked up the gold coin. 155332.content: The Girly Room - Sonic wakes up one day in his room to discover that his bedroom is now all girly. He suspects it is a prank by some of his friends until he starts to turn girly himself.
155332.title: The Girly Room

1553321.content: It was Saturday 7AM as Sonic' alarm clock woke him up. With eyes still closed, Sonic tossed and turned in his bed, but something was wrong when he smelled his pillow. It smelled like there was perfume on it! He then opened his eyes to a pillow that he isn't his. It was pink and had red and white hearts on it. He then sat up on his bed to discover that his room was changed into a girl's room with pink wall paper and boy band and some rock band posters all around him. He then dash to the window and looked outside and confirmed it to be his own room and his own house. What does he do?
1553321.title: A Different Room

choices: He searches the rest of the house
15533211.content:
Sonic stood in silence, eyes bulging at the sheer femininity of what he was pretty sure was (or at least used to be) his room. How? Why? As his mind raced from possibility to possibility, each thought growing more and more nightmarish, he started to tremble, knees and hands quivering with fright. A panicked whine started to rise from his throat, growing in volume as he began to search for any sign of his old room.

Movements frantic, Sonic ran over to his closet, throwing the doors wide. His terrified whine squeaked out into nothingness as he was presented with a wardrobe fit for a Disney princess. Where his shoes and gloves once were, a variety of hyper-feminine women's clothing was arranged in long rows of blinding pink frills and ethereal white lace. Hands shaking, he rustled through the frilly garments, searching for any sign of the room he knew or his famous shoes, socks and gloves. Where they were usually placed, he found only a pair of pink kitten heels, a pair of opaque white tights, and some frilly gloves that would have looked at home on a southern belle. Panic, now mixed with disgust, made him pull back from the closet, retreating with faltering steps as if the foreign clothes would attack him.
15533211.title: He panics

155332111.content:
Heart pounding, Sonic ran to his room's door, noting with a feeling of sickness the doorknob's new pink color. Upon opening it, Sonic was greeted with the staircase to his room he had known for years, but it was now painted a delicate shade of pink, its handrails decorated with fake flowers and pink ribbon. The wallpaper of the adjacent wall, once a simple blue, was a pink damask nightmare, somehow even girlier than he had feared. From his view down the stairs, it looked like the rest of the house was likewise remodeled for a preteen princess, every previously masculine or gender-neutral element now frilled, floral, or painted pink. Heart beating so fast he felt like it was going to explode, Sonic made his way down the stairs, his grip on the feminized handrail weakened by how much his hand was shaking.

When he saw who was standing in the living room, his heart sank. Before he could consider any other course of action, Sonic blurted out, "W-what's going on?", voice a trembling mess.

Who was there?
155332111.title: He searches the rest of the house

1553321111.content:
Sonic's question hung in the air, its quivering fear still palpable. Amy Rose, her usual dress exchanged for a simple combination of jeans and sweater, stood across the room, staring at Sonic's collection of photographs of friends and family arranged on the newly feminine mantelpiece.

Sonic hesitated at the foot of the stair, his heart-rate only increasing with each moment of silence.

"I'm not here." Her voice was a soft murmur, gentle and calm in sharp contrast to her usual hyperactive squeaking.

"W-what?"

"The photos. I'm not in any of them." There was something about her voice that was far more terrifying to Sonic than any roar or scream. She was talking like someone just waking from a dream, only half-conscious and less-than-half interested in what was actually happening. "Sonic, why don't you have a picture of me?"

"I, I, uh-"

She turned to look at him. Sonic's heart dropped to his stomach. Her eyes weren't sad so much as they were empty. She looked like every ounce of her naivety had been torn away in an instant, and the only thing that remained was her understanding of just how badly she had been used. He tried to step away, but his legs wouldn't listen.

"I used to love you, Sonic. You knew that." The hurt in her voice turned Sonic's stomach into slush. What the hell was going on? Did she do this? Was she another victim? She gestured to the mantelpiece, the movement lacking any sort of anger but dripping with something he felt could be pity. "Not a single photo. You didn't even answer any of my letters."

Sonic stood in silence, knees shaking, mouth open but unable to think of anything to say.

After a few moment of silence, Amy turned back to the photos, gently lifting one off of the mantel. He knew it well. It was a picture of him and Knuckles at the beach, waving at the camera with confident grins. Amy had asked to come, like she always did. Sonic, fear growing, remembered with perfect detail how he laughed at her and sped off, glancing back to see her standing teary-eyed. "Things have changed, Sonic. I'm... different."

Sonic's heart seized up as Amy turned to look at him, photo turned so that he could see it. Where he expected to see himself and Knuckles, he saw only Knuckles, sitting alone. "W-wha-" The picture changed again, and now Knuckles was gone as well. Sonic's mouth opened wider as his eyes bulged.

"I'm going to change things, Sonic. I can make it right, all of it. I can do it all, now." Amy, looking directly at Sonic, let go of the photograph's frame. It smashed to the floor with the sound of glass shattering, but when Sonic looked down, there was only the photo, now blank. "I can do anything."

Sonic tried to step back, speak, do anything, but his body refused, leaving him stationary and silent as he trembled.

"You're never going to save anyone again, Sonic. You won't have to. I've taken care of Eggman. I've taken care of all of them. You're not a hero, Sonic. Not anymore."

What the hell is she talking about? If he had been able to move, Sonic would have called her crazy, but here he was staring at her in paralyzed awe.

"You never were. No, not really. What sort of hero lets his lover's heart break, over, and over, and over? What sort of hero lets you chase him, but never tells you it won't work, never tells you there was no chance in the first place? Lets you live your life in worship?" Amy's voice stayed calm, but Sonic saw hurt blossom in her eyes. If he could use his vocal cords, he would have begun to whimper.

"I could make you love me. I could make you feel for me what I used to feel for you." She paused, looking down at the blank photo. It vanished, reappearing in her hand, unhurt and now once again in the frame. The picture was no normal, except that once again only Knuckles could be seen. "You don't deserve it." She looked up at him, the hurt in her eyes growing cold and calculating. "And even if you did, I could never look at you like that again."

She placed the picture back on the mantel. Sonic shivered when he realized that all of the other pictures were now likewise devoid of his presence. A slight whimper managed to escape through his frozen lips, hinting to the thoughts behind his widened eyes.

"No, Sonic, I'm not going to kill you. If I chose to, I could, but I am making things right. I am fixing things. No, you are going to be punished. Severely, yes, but in accordance with your crime." Sonic's whimper grew louder, straining against his paralysis as his eyes grew even wider and his knees threatened to buckle.

"You used me, Sonic. You played with me. I wasted years. I was a little girl when it started. You played with me. Treated me like a novelty, a pet. You fed my addiction, always taking care to break my heart just when I was felt our love was perfect." The hurt was back, simmering in her eyes. For the first time it had escaped to her voice, making the syllables of 'played' a knife in Sonic's gut.

"You're going to see how it feels. See how it hurts. You're going to spend every hour of your life obsessing, pleading, chasing. You're going to be a lovesick girl. You're going to swoon, beg, cry at the sight of your lover. We'll start with a year. A year of dresses, boys, the things you made me think about. After that, I'll decide if you deserve more."

Suddenly, Sonic could move. He backed away as fast he could, hands in front of his face as if he could protect himself.

"No running." Her eyes glittered with disgust, their shine hardening in disapproval at his attempt at escape. He froze in place, once again a trembling statue. "You're going to act this part, Sonic. Walk like a woman. Move like one."

Sonic, free again, took another faltering step back, lowering his hands down to his waist and drawing his elbows in, just as Rouge and Amy did.

"Good. Go upstairs and get dressed. I'll be waiting."

Sonic moved up the stairs as quickly as he could while maintaining the feminine posture his body now required. When he was in his room, he broke down and cried, curling into a ball on the floor. What the hell happened? Was she even Amy? She talked like some sort of robot, but her eyes were definitely alive. What was he going to do?

Her command rung in his head. Get dressed. He glanced over at the closet, its doors wide open to display the fashion nightmare inside. When searching for his clothes, he had seen a variety of different styles, all united by their femininity but ranging from cute to sexual. The thought of wearing anything from inside there disgusted him, but if she was serious he needed to get dressed before she got any more upset.

He got up slowly, wiping tears from his eyes as he looked around the room, noting all of the horrifying changes he had missed in his previous panic. Where his racing trophies had previously stood on their stands, an ornate vanity now filled up the wall. Frilly and puffy curtains, their appearance alone enough to make him feel nauseous, hung around his window, matching the design of his girly bed.

Still sniffling, he moved towards the-
1553321111.title: Amy

choices: Sonic has the ability to choose.
Amy seems to have chosen for him.
15533211111.content:
He wanted to get up and run. He wanted to jump out of the window and flee, keep running until he found out what Amy had become, and find a way to restore her and everything else to normal. To apologise to her and make sure he didn't make those mistakes again. To make sure that the rest of his friends were okay...

But he didn't. Her command stuck in in his head, and so he strutted girlishly toward the closet and began to rummage through the girly clothing, searching for something to wear. Something that would please her.
15533211111.title: Closet (Obey)

choices: Amy wants to see her handiwork.
155332111112.content:
Sonic grabbed the white tights he'd seen earlier, and slid his legs into them. He watched in horror, unable to stop hs body, which did exactly as Amy had bidden him. Yet even as he began to dress himself, his mind was occupied by her statement that he would be a girl. Was that true? She seemed to be altering reality around herself, maybe she could really do that..

Sonic's fingers gripped a bra, and wrapped it around his chest, fixing it in place. It hung loosely, hinting of things to come... making him gulp in terror. Once the bra was in place, he grabbed a corset, adding that to himself as well. It seemed to tie itself, pulling itself tight and squeezing his midriff in a way he never expected it would, leaving him sort of breath.

The whole ensemble was white, with soft pink frills, and looking at himself, he just wanted to curl up and die... But his body walked over to the kitten heels placed neatly by his bed, and stepped into them, strutting with a disturbing amount of grace as he returned to the closet, and his fingers closed on the pink nightmare that would be his new dress.

It was tight and form-fitting for a girl of his age, with a wide skirt that reached close to his knees. White frills encircled the hem, while the whole thing was starched to stick out. The top part of the dress had a low neckline, which would've exposed his cleavage, if he had any, with frills around that, too. A flower pattern covered the chest, with a pink, heart-shaped gemstone in the centre of the petals. Puff-ball sleeves covered her arms, with frills around the base of them. A large bow rested on the small of her back.

Finally, Sonic pulled on the long gloves she'd seen earlier. He'd seen earlier. He wasn't a girl. He wasn't going to be a girl...

Amy in a hospital gown turned around and saw Sonic. In her usual fangirl mode, she immediately dash to her hero. "Oh, it's nice to see you Sonic!" "Amy stop! I can't breathe!" Bye!" "Bye!" Sonic replied back.

Sonic waited for about half an hour til finally a doctor came in with a syringe. Sonic then gulped a bit at the sight of the needle. The doctor then plunged the needle into Sonic's shoulder and injected anesthetics into his bloodstream. "The operation will begin shortly. After some moments later, Sonic was now in the recovery room still knocked out. After a about 15 minutes, the drug was wearing off. Sonic stirred a bit in his bed trying to wake up. 15533222222222221.content:
One Saturday morning, Sonic was in Station Square, browsing around the stores and whatnot. He then decided to stop and check out a pawn shop. He went inside and saw many shelves with toys, books, clothes, and other kinds knickknacks and antiques. He took his time examining and browsing the many items on the shelves until he found something of interest. It was pretty old, looking like it was dated centuries ago yet still held it good condition, it was very thick and looked heavy, seeming to contain about a thousand pages or so. The title was simply called 'The Genderbook' and Sonic started to skim through it only to realize that nearly all the pages were blank! He then went back to the page that was right after the title page, and found a rule stating, "You can change a person's gender by writing down their NAME:____ and write GENDER:______. You can also control the rate of change by simply adding INSTANT (fast change) or GRADUAL (slow change) next to it." There were other rules for changing age, height, body mass, breast size and etc. Sonic was deeply intrigued by this and decided to buy it and it was really cheap.

After purchasing the book and feeling really eager to try it out, Sonic then dash home and headed to his room. He sat on his bed while opening the book, and grabbed a pencil that was on his nightstand. He wrote down NAME:____ and GENDER:_____ as the rules stated. Though he still don't know who to test it on.

Who does he test it on?

15533222222222222.title: Side Effects Include...

155332222222222221.content:
"Ugh! Can't believe I had to catch a Summer Cold! *Achoo!" Sonic said with a stuffy and runny nose as he looked around in the cold and cough medicine aisle.

An epidemic of this cold had hit Station Square hard, and medicine for some reason getting scarce. Well, at Sonic's local drug store at least as most of the medicine ran out. Though what was left were some pills for allergies, and some cold/fever/pain relieving medication, which what he really needed yet it was for women only. The box was pink with a picture of pink pills on it which definitely screamed girly product as it is. The reasons for being it women only were that it not only suppress the symptoms, but also helps with menstruation cycles and other things that apply to women.

Sonic decided to buy it since despite being for women only, it can help with his cold of course so it wouldn't hurt for a guy to try it, right? He also rather have this cold gone now, than to wait for more medication and staying in bed while using up tons of tissues for weeks. Sonic purchased the pills and headed straight on home to his apartment. It was on the second floor of an apartment complex, and filled with a kitchen in the same place as the living room, a master bedroom located in the back, a guestroom, two bathrooms (one in the master bedroom and one in the hall connecting that connected the living room and master bedroom), and a living room. He then opened the box, and took out two capsules from the packaging. He checked the back of the box reading the directions about how he needs to take pills about every 4-6 hours, and the side effects about drowsiness and other things that he didn't finished reading.

He then popped the pills into his mouth and drank a cup of water to help it go down smoothly. After a couple minutes, he suddenly felt drowsy. "Whoa, those pills' effects worked faster than I thought." Sonic said to himself. He then went to his room, the master bedroom, to sleep. Not knowing certain changes when he awakes.....

What kind of changes will he experience?

A few hours later, the three returned to Tails' laboratory. Tails looked over and saw the three ladies.

"I take it you showed those two the light?" Tails asked.

"Yep." Sonic replied with a smug grin.

"Men are just so...disgusting." Rouge shuddered.

"Can't believe I used to be one." Knuckles nodded.

"Yeah, Mobius has to be a 'girls only' place." Sonic said as she handed the Emeralds to Tails.

"And with this machine, I can make that happen." Tails said as she placed the emeralds inside, along with some of the flowers.

"And we brought the Master Emerald, just to be on the safe side." Knuckles said, putting her hand on the giant emerald.

"Good to know." Tails said, grabbing the switch. She pulled it down, after saying, "Prepare for a female paradise!"

Electricity began coursing through the room along with the femflowers' sweet aroma.

choices: They're met by more feminine Mobian/plants
15533222222222222222222222222221122211.content:
Pink electricity coursed through Mobius. Every sentient male creature it touched immediately became female. Any being it touched had its mind altered. Every plant turned bright pink and the sky turned a brighter shade of blue, making all Mobius look like one, big Easter egg.

Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Rouge looked, happily, on the world they helped change.

"Isn't this great?" Rouge asked.

"Yep, it sure is." Knuckles nodded.

"Hey, since we're all girls, how about we rename ourselves?" Sonic asked, "I think I'll be named Violet."

"I'll be Daisy." Tails said.

"Call me Rose." Rouge, surprisingly, chirped in.

"Aw, I wanted that." Knuckles moaned, "Guess I'll have to be Lilly."

The three girls giggled at Knuckles' choice.

"But why'd the flower deal come to mind?" Violet asked.

"Just look at your feet." Daisy replied.

Everyone did and gasped in surprise. Their feet had roots growing out of them! Also, the flowers they named themselves after were sprouting out of them.

"What's goin' on?" Rose asked as she touched one growing on her arm.

"I think the energy merged flower DNA with ours." Daisy replied.

"So...we're half plant?" Lilly asked.

"I think so." Daisy replied.
15533222222222222222222222222221122211.title: Female Paradise

While a bit shocked at the actions of the four, they were joyful nonetheless. Shadow changed her name to Shadra while the others kept their names.

For a few months, the Mobian/plant-girls feared that an all-female population would be unable to reproduce. However, it turned out that they could create seeds every seven years that would grow into cute, baby girls. Violet currently has a daughter named Sonia, Daisy has one named Tabitha, Lilly has one named Nikki, Rose's is named Angela, Cream has one named Peaches, and Amy has three named Sonicca, Taylor, and Ashley.
