1553322222222222222222222222222221.content:
Sonic grinned, as he looked up at Eggman's latest machine. Some giant mechanical reptile of some sort, bristling with cannons and covered in armour.

"Not bad, Eggman, not bad." He smirked. "It's almost a threat. Almost."

"Silence, you little blue pincushion! This machine is far too powerful for your paltry speed! You will never break its armour!" Eggman ranted from inside the robot.

"Maybe..." Sonic shrugged. "But I have these."

In a flash, the seven Chaos Emeralds appeared around his body. They spun around him a few times, then plunged into him, golden light exploding upwards around him as he began to change form.

Inside the cockpit of his vessel, Eggman grinned. The hedgehog was even more foolish than usual if he believed that he wouldn't have a plan for Super Sonic...

Pressing a button, the robot's chest opened, a cannon extending out. It locked onto the still-transforming Sonic, and fired. A pink beam erupted from the squat barrel, slicing through the air and colliding with the hedgehog's unmoving body. A bright explosion of yellow and pink energy illuminated the darkened chamber, followed by smoke.

As she landed, Sonic rose to her feet, ready to finally flee! But it was too late, another beam blasted her, finally restoring her powers, but knocking her into completely docile daze. She stood dumbly on the belt, staring blankly at her looming fate.

The belt whizzed forward, taking her through an energy field. Her body swelled up, breasts bouncing up to an E-cup, backside swelling to match. Her stockings developed a few tears, as her legs fattened into thunder-thighs.

Then a bell-shaped capsule slammed down, entombing her, and began to build the Badnik suit around her...

"You are mine at last, and will spend the rest of your days in my service."

"Now go, my minion, and serve me well!"

The motobug revved up, and slowly rolled away. Inside, Sonic could do nothing but watch.

1553322222222222222222222222222221222112.content:
Normally, a Badnik Sonic would get some attention, and even a regular Badnik would get popped by a Freedom Fighter, but she was inside a Motobug. They had extremely basic AI, and most of them were slow. So when people raided Eggman's base, they ignored her. THey bypassed her. They let the robot continue its work.

Months later, Motobug continued her patrols. With her mind still numbed, and her life constrained to the Motobug's work, combined with people passing her up as just a Motobug... Sonic was losing her grip. She couldn't understand why no-one came to save her.. Until one day, she started to understand. It was because she was a Motobug. Nobody saved Motobugs. They were Motobugs. Beneath notice. Just drones. She was a Motobug. She was Motobug.
1553322222222222222222222222222221222112.title: Sonic spends so long in the Motobug that she st...

1553322222222222222222222222222221222112.content: Once Motobug had accepted her place in the world as a lowly drone, her attitude improved considerably. She was always happy to receive orders and obey her Master. She liked being just another Motobug in the army, slowly rolling around the base on patrol. It was exciting to occasionally be sent further afield to capture and contain other people, who could then become robots like her. If she was truly lucky, she might get a new brother or sister Motobug out of the deal! But mostly, she just stuck to her assigned patrol route. She worked all day and all night, dutifully serving her Master like a good Motobug should. Because she was a Motobug. Her name was Motobug. And that was just the way she liked it.

Her arms were covered in segmented metal tubes, ending in metal crab-claws. her eyes were glazed and red, with her face showing no expression. Her quill-tips were dyed crimson, and she had a metal hairband with Crabmeat eyestalks attached.

Her arms rested by her sides, as her legs began to stiffly march her off of the belt, much to Eggman's amusement. With most of Super Sonic's body still exposed, she would be just as powerful as usual, and hopefully, completely invincible.

1553322222222222222222222222222221222222.content:
For weeks now, Sonic had lived a life of luxury. She received regular meals, and not just her usual junk food, but lavish, gourmet dishes. She had access to exercise machines to keep herself fit. She had her own bathroom, with a huge jacuzzi bath, always stocked with bubble-bath, shampoo, and everything else she needed. She had shelves of books and films and games. She had soft pyjamas and a fluffy bathrobe to wear, along with a vast array of other clothes- dresses, blouses, belly tops, tank tops, t-shirts, sports bras, tube-tops, skirts, shorts, jeans, pants, leggings, everything... All of it at least superficially resembled her captor's uniform, but they were at the same time very comfy and preserved her newfound modesty.

Her room had a soft, plush carpet, comfortable chairs, a large TV, and the most delightful bed. She had a warm heater to keep her comfortable, and a ceiling fan for those hot summers.

Even with all of this, Eggman was doting on her. He'd regularly send slaves down to look after her, take care of her hair and pur, which were still gold, and help her adapt to her new body.
1553322222222222222222222222222221222222.title: Eggman pampers her, making her want to stay.

choices: She is Super Sophia, Eggman's pampered pet.

1553322222222222222222222222222221222222.content:
In spite of everything, Sonic didn't want to leave. She knew she should be outraged, trying to escape and defeat the mad doctor... but she didn't try. She just let herself be pampered and coddled, and gradually became more and more accepting of her new life as a citizen of the Eggman Empire.

The transformation beam had robbed her of her powers and her will to fight. That had served as an easy basis for her corruption. She didn't run or fight because she didn't have the power to do so. She didn't want to fight because it would get her hurt and in a worse situation than before. Now she still didn't want to fight, but not out of fear. She just didn't feel like going against the man who had taken care of ehr and given her all these nice things.

Even the new gender was accepted now. While she'd initially been very confused by her new form, she now embraced it. She sat at her vanity table, brushing through the soft locks of golden hair that had once been stiff quills- they still had a similar shape, but they were useless for fighting and really just a hairstyle. She applied her makeup, and dressed in her Eggman Empire uniform.

Eggman had watched her conversion with growing delight, first her steady acceptance of his care, then her growing to love her new creature comforts, then her embracing her new feminity, and most importantly, the day she had strode into his throne room, proudly wearing her uniform, proclaiming her allegiance to her Master, and calling herself "Sophia."
1553322222222222222222222222222221222222.title: It's working, Sonic likes her new life.

Eggman, meanwhile, looked at the mindless, powerless, former Super Sonic by his side and felt... unsatisified...

"Guys, you have any quarters? I ran out and I want to play formula-1!" Tails called from the arcade. "Tails, you already beat the highscore on every game here. Give it a rest." Shadow groaned. Tails gave a cheap smile. "I guess you're right." He joined the rest at the table. "Guys, I should really get back to the emerald. Rouge hasn't tried to steal it in days, and I think she's planning something..." Knuckles growled. "You always think she's planning something!" Sonic exclaimed, and they all laughed.
Meanwhile on a distant planet...
"Sir, the viewers keep tuning out, and people live at the stadium are leaving." Says a small alien with a notebook and pen.
"I'm aware of that." Says a bigger alien. They are both looking out a window in a Roman collaseum type structure, made out of metal and futuristic decoration. Inside there are yawning aliens, watching four, what look like women, fighting.
"*Sigh* Our viewers don't want to watch petty troops brawling to become the manliest! They want to see the manliest slowly become harmless bimbos!" The smaller alien exclaimed. "I know our problem. Luckily, I also know the solution..." He said, and grinned evily. He walked over to a holographic screen and on it it showed four anthros with bored expressions, munching on some pizza. "I don't see your point sir." The small alien said impatiently. "I've been watching these four. They are brave, strong, fast, and definitely going to be on our little show. They will face off to prove who is manliest!"

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic is woken from his nap by an incessant doorbell, groggily taking himself to the door and looking at the delivery driver. "Special Delivery!" Sonic yawns and looks over the deliveryman, a cheerful red cardinal. "I didn't order anything... What could it be?" he asks, starting to wake up. "I just deliver things, sorry." Sonic nods, "Have a nice day, see ya around." he comments, smiling politely to the bird. He tosses the package to the couch and gets a drink, setting it at the edge of the table and moving the package there. "It better be worth my nap..." he grabs the package, tearing the paper to shreds and stopping as he sees just what's inside, staring for almost a full minute. "Who'd send me panties?" he questions.

He has a feeling this isn't a prank even Knuckles or Shadows would do, just by the look of them the garments would be unnecessarily expensive for a joke. Sonic pokes a hole into the package with his finger, taking out a pair of yellow thong panties. Thankfully for his privacy, he shutters his windows if he knows he's going to nap. "I've always wondered how they felt, I guess I can't get a better reason to try 'em." he takes his shoes off and slides each leg through the panties, pulling them tight onto his crotch. They feel a bit tight, but comfortable. "Interesting..." the hedgehog rubs himself through the panties, and finds himself calling his friend and stalker, Amy Rose, without realizing it. Her voice snaps him out of his daze. "Hello? Is that you Sonic?" He confirms, "Yeah, it's me." he shakes his head, wondering why he called her, strangely she'd be thinking the same thing.

"So did you want something? I thought you were going to be busy this afternoon..." Sonic realizes he said something to that effect, "Oh, well you see...."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic walks into the Police Office, trying to look natural carrying a black bag at his side. "It's kind of weird to be in here." he says to himself before heading up to the desk in front, looking in the eyes of a rather cute girl, not that he shows any interest. "Can I help you?" she asks sweetly with a curious look to the bag in Sonic's hand. "Just this, a janitor asked me to take this bag to you." She blinks and clears her desk to see what's inside it, Sonic tapping his foot as she does. "Oh, thank you. These are Julie's things, just her uniform and some personal items... May I ask if you had another reason to come here?" she gives him a quizzical look.

He smiles, "Oh yeah, I was going to see about an application, but the same guy told me you wouldn't be hiring unless someone quit." Sonic starts to walk off, and the girl stops him. "Hold on!" she calls, and Sonic returns in a flash. "Yeah?" he knows what she's going to say, but she goes ahead and says "Julie quit this morning, as a matter of fact. Fill out this..." she slides him an application, "And then go down to H.R, down this hall, make a left, then the door at the end. We'd be glad to have someone like you fighting crime with us, Sonic." the cat girl blushes and smiles, "Err, thanks for your help." she motions to a chair and Sonic leaves her with a smile to calm the girl down.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: police

choices: She has something to tell him before the interviewer is ready.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic sits down smiling softly at how narrowly he got this job, feeling confident his reputation will ensure he gets it. He starts right away with the pen, filling out the basic information quickly from his good mood. Name, species, date of birth, shirt-size, nothing he has to think about. Nobody seems to come in meanwhile, but the girl is replaced by a male rabbit who pays Sonic little attention. He moves on to the second piece of paper, signing his name at the bottom of both sides without reading, but making sure nothing really strange is present.

With everything filled out, Sonic organizes the papers and heads down the hall. The rabbit gives Sonic a knowing glance, resuming his computer work. "Just like Tails." he thinks, following the directions of the girl he spoke to. "H.R. Hiring Reception". He hands his application to the secretary, "Hello Sonic, interesting to see you here." she flips through his papers, handing them to someone else, it appears. "You applied at the end of our hiring period, and you got here just when we lost someone. Funny coincidence." she giggles. "We can get you into an interview in 15 minutes, at most." Sonic smiles, "Perfect, let's do that then, no sense in waiting right?"

The girl nods and types away, "Have a seat, I promise it won't be long." Sonic nods and takes the nearest chair, laying back.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"'Swimsuit model wanted', huh?" Sonic looked down at the piece of paper in his hands. He needed some extra money on the side and he definitely had the body for it. Sure, he couldn't swim, but that probably wouldn't really matter, right?

Shrugging, Sonic made his way to the address specified on the paper, and found himself at a tall office building. He made his way inside, and spoke to the person at the reception desk. She looked like a cute ferret girl, and gave Sonic a happy smile.

"Hello sir! How may I help you today?"

"I'm here about this job offer." Sonic said, handing the paper over. She looked at it, and raised an eyebrow, then turned and typed into a computer, then back up to him.

"I think you'll do." She nodded.

"What, no interview?"

"You're getting your picture taken, you'll be fine."

"Fair point." Sonic shrugged.

She directed him to an elevator, and he made his way up to the studio.


Sonic stepped into the room, and saw the boss...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic cringed at the sight of Honey the Cat, chatting away to a photographer. The feline was, although friendly, manipulative and shrewd, and she had a sadistic streak. She'd taunted and tormented Tails, and was responsible for inflicting Amy's awful fashion choices on the world. He knew he should've checked who was offering...

"Sonic!" Honey called out. She'd seen him. No use backing out now. She walked over and greeted him, shaking his hand. "What brings you here?"

"Uh, I'm... here for the modelling job?"

Honey smirked, and began to laugh.

"I mean, you can try, but... I don't think you're what I'm looking for."

"What? Really? It's just getting some pictures done, why can't I do that?"

"I don't think you're up for it." She shrugged, looking away.

"No way, I can do it!" He demanded. "No problem! Whatever it takes, I'll do it!"

"Really?" She turned around, smirking darkly. He wanted to bottle it there, and give up, but he was being challenged now. He wasn't going to give in. He wasn't going to let her intimidate him.

"Yeah!" He said strongly, not knowing that he'd sealed his fate...

"Alright then. You're hired. Sign here." She handed him a clipboard and pen. Without reading the contract, he scrawled his signature on the dotted line.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic woke up to see sunlight pouring through the window, and sat upright, groaning. At first, the higher-pitched voice didn't register, nor did the weight on his chest... But a few seconds later, she looked down at herself and let out a scream.

Once Sonic had calmed down, she began to check her surroundings. She was in a cool, darkened room, Eggman Empire imagery on the walls. Her bed was a comfy queen-sized double, and there appeared to be an en-suite bathroom, a vanity table, and a closet. Looking out of the window, she saw the vastness of space, with the shattered Mobius below her.

"I'm a girl... and I'm trapped on Eggman's space station..." She mused. "I gotta find a way out of here..."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic stays female when the sun rises.

choices: It opens, time to make a run for it!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic looked down at herself, and sighed. She'd need to get some clothing before she tried to escape. Her breasts bounced too much when she moved and she couldn't run without protecting her feet.

She crossed over to the closet, and opened it, finding it full of Eggman uniforms.

"Figures." She frowned. "Well, best get this over with..."

She picked up a pair of black pants, and pulled them up her legs. Despite their tightness, she found them surprisingly easy to run in. After that, she grabbed the red jacket and wrapped it around her upper body, threading her arms through the sleeves. She zipped it up and found it amazingly comfortable, as it supported her chest. She then added the gloves, and pulled a pair of boots onto her feet. Testing herself, she ran around the room a few times, and smiled. It was as easy as ever.

The hedgehog walked over to the door, and grabbed the handle.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic decides to put some clothes on first.

choices: The footage starts to have a strange effect on her...
Sonic spends her time mocking it and waits for Eggman.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The door didn't open. The handle didn't even budge. Her face fell, and she frowned, stomping her foot in frustration.

"Ugh, all this and I'm trapped here!" She growled.

"Getting upset, Sonic?" Eggman's voice echoed.

"Eggman!? What are you doing to me?"

"I'm running a few tests, my dear. Your transformation is intriguing, and I wish to understand it."

"What am I, some lab rat?" She shouted.

"No. You are my guest." The doctor replied. "I consider myself a gentleman, so you have a comfortable room, plenty of clothing, and three meals a day."

"Some gentleman, you made me dress like one of your slaves and you won't let me leave the room!"

"Would you prefer I leave you to your fate with no idea what your transformation is?" He prodded. "Be a gracious guest, and I'll make sure you're healthy and safe."


Sonic bit her lip, as the doctor was unfortunately making a good point.

"I... I'd find Tails..."

"How? How would you get to him from here?"

"Uh..." She murmured. "OKay, fine. So what are these tests like?"

"I've already taken some blood samples. I am currently testing them. You'll find out when they're done."

"Right..."


Eggman's voice cut out, and Sonic flopped back on her bed. She thought about askingif the mad doctor was watching her, so that, if he wasn't, she could ditch the uniform... but it was very comfy. She shrugged and decided to keep it on for now.

She looked around the room again, curling up on her bed. It was soft and comfortable, warm too. Honestly it was better than most of the other beds she'd ever had. She noticed a treadmill in the corner, along with a TV screen and a bookshelf. She was surprised that Eggman would provide entertainment for her, but decided not to question it, and have a look at what was on offer.

All of the books seemed to be Eggman Empire propaganda, as did everything on the TV. Still, it was better than sitting and moping, maybe she cold have some fun mocking the content.

Sonic cued up a channel and sat back to watch.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: It's locked.

choices: The subliminals in the video brainwash Sonic...
She manages to snap out of her trance.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Sonic watched the propaganda films, she expected to be able to make fun of it. Mock the Doctor's imbecilic plans and excuses for his evil acts. And yet... she found herself agreeing.

It wasn't like the previous rulers of Acorn had been good people. Sally was her friend and she loved her, but she too was unhappy with the actions of her father, and very much an exception to the rule. Eggman taking over had brought her and her friends together too... Maybe it was a good thing?

He fought GUN a lot too, and it wasn't like GUN were the most righteous people around. They'd committed many horrible crimes, and been a pain in Sonic's own backside on numerous occasions. It wasn't like his enemies were exactly heroic. Perhaps Eggman was right to fight them...

He was the smartest man on the planet... Maybe Tails had more intelligence, but he didn't exactly have the drive to use it. Eggman did, and if someone was going to rule the world, it should be the smartest, the best, not just whoever was rich enough, or born into the right family... There was some merit to Eggman's rule...

His forces had all been equal opportunity legions... Mobian, human, and robot working in harmony for a common goal... It was more than could be said for other nations... Bringing people together equally could hardly be a bad thing, could it...?

Even now, his actions had done good... He had united the warring nation of Chun-Nan, with his legion accepting people regardless of their clan, and proving very popular with this method. There was proof positive that he could be the great leader he fancied himself as, and help the people that needed it!

Even she was benefitting from his kindness! Even though she had been his hated enemy, he was now providing her with a comfy outfit, a cozy, almost luxurious bedroom, and he was going to feed her, when he could've shoved her in a cell and locked her up for hours of testing. He was even researching her transformation and caring for her while they both awaited the results...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The footage starts to have a strange effect on ...

choices: She gets lost/distrated on the way.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The hypnotic signals in the film had done their work, and Sonic was now unconditionally accepting everything the video put forth. Eggman was the rightful ruler of the world, the people should obey Eggman, Eggman taking over was a good thing, Eggman had brought peace, Eggman had united people, Eggman's enemies were wrong, Eggman was right...

She should obey Eggman...

"Well, of course..."

She should join the Eggman Empire...

"It only makes sense..."

She should serve Eggman...

"It's for the best..."

Eggman is your Master...

"Yes, he is!"

You must obey your Master...

"I must obey Master Eggman!"


The brainwashing videos lasted for hours, and when the video finally turned off, Sonic woke from her daze, lying back on her bed, pawing at her breast and crotch with a dopey smile on her face. She lay there for a while, as her new self took hold completely.

The trance eventually faded, her head clearing, as she blinked, sitting herself upright. She smiled, stretching herself out, getting to her feet.


"Well well well, did you enjoy your little matinee, Sonic?" Eggman's voice echoed over the intercom.

"Master!" She gasped, snapping to attention and saluting. "Yes Master, I did!"

"THere's a good girl..." He smirked. "The door is unlocked. Come to the bridge and report for duty!"

"Yes Master!"
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The subliminals in the video brainwash Sonic...

Sonic hated Valentines' Day. it was his least favourite day of the year. Another twenty-four hours of Amy at her absolute worst. So every year, he stayed inside and taped up his letterbox, making sure that none of her seventy-odd cards would reach him.

So when he heard a knock at the door, he feared the worst. He went over to the peephole and looked through, spotting a rather beleagured delivery man on the other side. He seemed to be holding a large bouquet of flowers. Roses, as per usual. Amy always gave him red ones, but these were pink... Maybe it wasn't from her? Deciding that it would be cruel to leave the man standing there, he opened the door.

"Delivery for Miss Sonic the Hedgehog?" The man drawled uninterestedly, looking at the clipboard in his other hand.

"Uh, it's Mister Sonic the Hedgehog?" Sonic prompted. He was both confused and a little insulted, that someone could mistake him for a girl, and that this man had apparently not heard of him, the world-famous hero.

"Sorry, sir. Probably a website glitch or a mis-written order." The delivery man replied, handing Sonic the flowers. "Sign here please."

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic's personality changes.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: "Mmm smells like lavender..." Sonic said to himself as he searched around for a vase, not realizing he was swaying his hips as he walked. "I wonder which of my male friends was the admirer." Before that thought wouldn't have even come across Sonic's mind as he finally found the vase and placed the flowers in. Before he could even put water inside he heard another knock at his door that caused the hedgehog to sigh as he made his way over them, it likely was Amy whom he didn't have the heart to tell that he was gay as he knew she was smitten by him. Once the door was open however it was Tails with a gas mask on and a small device in his hand that seemed to be indicating something was wrong. "Sorry Sonic but my toxic indicator is saying something dangerous could be in your apartment, are you over cooking chili dogs again?" Sonic had to hold back a laugh as he moved out of the way for the fox to enter, he was adorable in his eyes but too young to consider dating let alone Tails considered him like a brother and Sonic didn't want to put that at risk. "Not this time Tails, do you need me to leave my apartment for awhile?" "That may be for the best Sonic, try to meet me back at the Workshop." With a nod Sonic went off as Tails went through the apartment until he discovered the flowers were the cause of toxicity. "I hope Sonic didn't breathe too much in..." As he pulled out a box of matches he noticed the tag with the message written on it and snatched it off to scan at home so he could discover the sender, next he dumped the flowers into a bucket and tossed a lit match with them all in Sonic's bathroom with the window open so the fumes could safely escape. Tails would wait a couple of minutes before leaving for his home...as this was all happening did Sonic go to Tails' Workshop immediately or did he take some detours?

choices: Sonic stops on the road to wrap the gift.
Sonic gets home before he takes care of the wrapping.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic finds himself in a busy town, of all days to be busy. Amy insisted he come by early this afternoon, surely to make him admit his excuses are just that... But today he is aiming to get something special just for her, a gift to make her forgive him. He looks around, "Doesn't anyone have something for a hedgehog girl?" he grumbles, checking the time on a nearby clock as he walks along and into a Pawn Shop.

This shop has all sorts of items, especially jewelry like any other would, in front is a most unusual item. He eyes it, a nice solid silver quill brush. He takes a look at the gems along the handle and puts his hand on the case. "Uh... This one please?" He looks around for the clerk, seeing a red, cardinal woman who comes over to him, "I wouldn't expect a... oh, Sonic! That explains everything." she puts her wing to her mouth and chuckles, "Would you like it gift-wrapped?" Sonic smiles, "You're spot on. Thanks, but I'll wrap it myself, cut me the paper though." The bird nods, "Very well!" She rings him up and Sonic charges the cost of it without a second look at the price, taking his bag and running back home.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes

choices: Cream speaks up, having noticed the cereal doing things.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic's stomach grumbles as he walks ahead of Tails to Vanilla and Cream's place, "Maybe we should have brought something to eat." Tails speeds up to walk by the hedgehog's side, "She lets me raid her fridge all the time, Sonic. You can eat, and get to know Cream's mom." he says cheerfully, and Sonic sighs, "I suppose we haven't talked lately." The two of them continue on, knocking at Vanilla's door when they arrive. Cream answers, "Welcome Mister Sonic!" she says cheerfully, noticing his lack of cheer quite easily. "Hey Cream, mind if we eat breakfast with you guys?"

She looks at Tails, smiling. "Sure, mommy made something special for you two, but I said it wouldn't be quite enough..." she smirks, guiding the boys in and going with them to the dining room table. Two plates are half-eaten at one end of the table, the other end where Sonic and Tails sit is bare, the center of the table has a few plates, bowls, and silverware. "What would you boys like?" Vanilla, the girl's mother, asks. Sonic glances at what they've been eating, while Tails asks for his meal "A fried egg and soft taco, please?" Sonic shakes his head at Tails, "Uhm... I'll take the soup and scrambled eggs."

Vanilla looks at Sonic confused, "Soup...? Oh! I had cereal, not soup." Sonic feels silly and nods, "I'll take the cereal then, Vanilla" She giggles a bit, "It's for women, you know. Supposed to boost curves and all that." she explains, but her suggestions don't phase him, "I don't believe in that, no offense! I don't think a bowl of cereal will keep Amy from fawning over my good looks." Vanilla chuckles and gives in, heading to the kitchen.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: What kind of haunted house?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Haunted House

choices: Sonic waits for someone to turn up
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic was, as usual, out running for the day. Unluckily for him however, a storm had set in, and seemed intent on soaking him to the skin. Indeed, the ground was so wet and muddy, that he could no longer run quickly.

Sonic tried to zoom off again, but simply slipped and ended up face down in the mud. As such, it was a very wet and miserable hedgehog that looked up at the hill in from of him, and spied a large house sitting on the brow.

Sonic was not unused to speaking to random people, and considered that he might be able to talk his way into staying in the house for a short while, at least until the storm had passed. Therefore he slowly trudged up the hill, and approached the house.

The house was a ramshackle old pile, built of timber and stone. No lights were visible from the windows.

Sonic tried the doorbell, but no sound was produced. A few seconds later however, and the door slowly swung open. Peering around the door, Sonic saw only a empty hallway.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Real/Authentic

choices: Sonic walks further into the house.
Sonic waits where he is to see if someone arrives.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The house might've been foreboding to some, but Sonic wasn't one to be cautious, and he was always looking for a new adventure. Smirking, he stepped over the threshold and walked into the house.

As he did so, the door slammed closed behind him.

"Must be the wind..." He shrugged.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic enters the house

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Throwing caution aside, Sonic strode forward, hoping to find the occupants of the house.

He didn't find anyone, or any real signs of anyone being her recently. He noted however that picture franes were present along the hallway of the house, but strangely, the frames were vacant.

Finally, at the end of the hallway, he came across a large staircase, and upon climbing to the top, found several rooms. The first was a large bedroom, with he noticed, a large bathroom.

Sonic was still filthy from the previous fall in the mud, and coming to the conclusion that the house was abandoned, he decided to see if the shower worked.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic walks further into the house.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Sonic used the shower, he was unaware that the house was occupied, just not in the manner he expected.

Concealed in the shadows, a Boo observed carefully. Finally someone had entered their house, and now they could put their plan into action.

The Boo and friends had several options to achieve their aim, they could either try and possess their guest, allowing them to adapt their host as they saw fit. Or they could carefully manipulate the environment, and perhaps convince their guest to help them of their own free will.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: It still works

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: As Sonic got out of the shower, the ghost floated up behind him and faded into his body. A cold numbness spread through him, as the spirit invaded his body and mind, trying to take over. The soothing feeling of lethargy wrapped around his brain, dulling his senses.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Try for possession

choices: Sonic picks a punk / goth outfit
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic felt a sort of weakness come over his body, as if he was extremely tired, and needed to rest. He carelessly flopped to the floor, feeling completely drained of energy. Try as he might, he could not seem to rouse himself at all.

Inside, the Boo ghost was grappling with how best to try and control it's new host. Complete control was going to be extremely difficult, so it decided that it would be best to try and influence the host first, until either the host was suitably corrupted, or complete control was surrendered.

Fortunately the Boo could rely on others of it's kind to help out by setting the environment up in a suitable manner.

The first order of business was a change of clothes, the Boo wanted it's host's appearance to reflect it's presence. Something dark and edgy was clearly in order. This would start the host on the way to a change in attitude, then further corruption would become easier.

Sonic slowly began to come around, and after checking his surroundings, immediately noted that he was freezing cold. He rushed over to a wardrobe, and flung the doors wide.

Normally Sonic hated clothing, but he would make an exception in the current condition. As he studied the contents of the wardrobe, Sonic seemed to hear a little voice in his head, it said that a little change in style might be good, and that being the good guy wasn't always fun.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The ghost takes over.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Which one?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic picks a punk / goth outfit

choices: Go straight for the girly option!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Goth guy or goth girl?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Goth

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Inside the wardrobe Sonic found various outfits that would surely belong to a goth guy who seemed to follow the "mall goth" trend. There was a wide variety of tops and t-shirts, mostly black, and some baggy pants with various bits of hardware hanging from them. The boots looked frightening, with huge platforms.

Sonic thought this style of clothing would better suit some others he knew, but there seemed to be little other choice.

He was still cold, and surely no-one would see him...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Guy... for now.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: What sort of goth girl?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Go straight for the girly option!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic stared at the contents of the wardrobe with disappointment. It contained all girls clothing, and not just that, but all the clothing seemed to have a modern day goth theme. He spotted t-shirts with band names he had never heard of, fishnet tops, spiked collars and short black skirts. In the bottom of the wardrobe were sets of boots with huge platform heels. Along the side, striped stockings hung, along with some pants, mostly black, covered in rips and with various pieces of chain hanging from them. In the top part, some hooded tops were stacked, again featuring weird band names.

He couldn't use any of this, surely? He thought. But another chill spread throughout his body, and just then, that little voice again in his head spoke, suggesting that there was no harm, and no-one would ever know.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Modern-day "mall goth."

choices: He goes with a t-shirt, a hoodie, and some pants, trying to look less girly.
He grabs the girliest possible option right away!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: "I guess it won't hurt." He shrugged, much to the ghost's amusement. He reached out, picking out his first choice...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic gets dressed

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic grabbed the first of his choices, a black t-shirt with some weird tribal design on the front and quickly slipped it on over his head. To his dismay however, he found that it was too short to completely cover his upper body, and left him with a bare midriff. Deciding that nothing could be done, as all the other t-shirts were likely to be the same size, he shrugged and left it in place.

Next he picked up a black hoodie, this one with the same design as the t-shirt printed on the rear. Pulling it on, he found that it also was too small for him, and he couldn't manage to zip it up at all. So, he kept it on unzipped.

Finally he looked at the pants, and decided that a baggy set of combat pants was probably the best way to go. The other sets looked way to tight for him, so he didn't want to risk tearing them. The pair he had were again black, and bristled with various pieces of chain and metal rings. "At least all the pockets might be useful." He said to himself, forgetting that he had never needed pockets before.

After stepping into the pants, he noticed another problem. The length of the pants meant that they drooped over his feet, and onto the floor. He couldn't run, or indeed walk properly like this.

The little voice in his head popped up again, suggesting that this outfit was designed to be worn with boots, and maybe, just maybe he should chose some accessories also.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: He goes with a t-shirt, a hoodie, and some pant...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic decided it would be a good idea. After all, it was his idea, right?

He began to peruse the rest of the contents of the closet.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Listen to the advice

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Yeah, some boots would help carry off this outfit, he thought.

Checking in the bottom of the wardrobe, Sonic found some that looked like they might fit. He pulled them on, finding that they came up to his knees easily. It took him a little while to fasten all the straps, but the large platform at the bottom of the boots at least ensured that his pants no longer dragged over the floor.

Walking about, sonic found the boots really comfortable. He considered that he should maybe have tried this kind of look a long time ago.

Inside Sonic's head, the ghost considered it's next move...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: He chooses some boots first.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic cast his eyes over some of the accessories hanging up in the wardrobe. He only needed clothes really, no point in bothering with them, he thought. Just as he was turning away however, a little nagging idea in his head suggested that he shouldn't be so hasty, and some of the items might be fun.

Again he looked at the items, and eventually decided that he would at least see what they looked like. Digging around he found some fingerless black gloves, which he slipped over his hands absentmindedly.

Next his hands brushed up against a leather collar, quite wide and featuring large metal spikes pointing outwards. At the front of the collar, a small tag hung, such as dog would have to show their name. This tag however showed only a small picture of what looked like a cartoon ghost. He felt it over on his hands, it certainly suited the style of clothing in the wardrobe, and seemed to be something the owner of all this clothing might possibly wear.

For some reason Sonic couldn't take his eyes off the collar, the leather felt so soft, and the spikes were really shiny, it looked the perfect size for him.

Sonic caught a glance of himself in a nearby window, the blackness outside made his reflection clear, and so he looked upon himself. Here he was, in some abandoned house, wearing clothing that made him look like a mall Goth. His huge platform boots peaked out from the baggy combat pants he wore, and the chains dangling from the pants rattled and clinked together when he moved, his t-shirt was too small for him, and his hoodie couldn't be zipped up. Yet, his appearance didn't seem to bother him, indeed he was quite liking the change.

His attention returned to the collar, he had come this far, and he might not get the chance to try something like this again...

Eventually, Sonic passed the collar around his neck, and snapped it into place. It felt so comfortable, and looked so perfect.

Inside his head the ghost was delighted, the collar greatly amplified the ghosts abilities, and signalled Sonic's acceptance as a host. Now was the time...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Accessories

choices: The ghosts can alter Sonic's form with their own power.
They have a different way to change him in another room.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: The ghost giggled, partially floating out of Sonic's body. THe hedgehog's eyes glazed over, slipping into a trance as the spirit conversed with its fellows, discussing their plan. Their victim's mind was now receptive to anything they wanted to put in there, and with that complete, they were ready to make his body suit their needs too.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Body changes

choices: They are happy, on to the next part of the plan
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The time was right, the ghosts began to focus all their power and bend their efforts to reshaping their victim to suit their desires.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
King Boom Boo was contained behind an invisible barrier, he could not pass unless he was invited and accepted by a mortal.

As the goth girl was led into the room that served as a prison for the king, she felt a tingle of excitement at being selected to serve her king.

She noticed the king floating at the back of the room, and bowed deeply before him.

The king smiled cruelly, and then spoke quietly. "Long ago I was imprisoned here, I cannot escape unless a mortal accepts me into the living world." He explained. "I have selected you to serve me as my wife, and hence set me free." "Do this and you shall be rewarded". He added.

The girl was delighted at the prospect of serving her King in this important task, before she could accept the king spoke again. "To free me you must be prepared to completely devote yourself to me, body and soul." He stated. "You will belong to me, and be my slave forever".

The girl was ecstatic and delighted, the prospect of being enslaved to her king forever filled her with anticipation, she hoped she would prove worthy.

To slow her submission, she bowed lower, until she was crawling on the floor. She then spoke softly, "Master, it will be this slaves pleasure to serve you forever, in any way possible." She said. "My body and soul belong to you, forever."

At first nothing seemed to happen, then KIng Boom Boo started to glow dimly, and a sound like shattering glass filled the air.

The ghosts began celebrating, their king was free, free at last.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman empire uniform

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Sonic watched, gloves and shoes melted and the material began to travel along Sonic's new body.

The material clung to her legs and arms as it moved, slowly crawling along, It reached her waist, and Sonic looked down in surprise as it continued on its journey up and past her chest.

Eventually the material covered her whole body, and began to shift again, forming new clothes.

When Sonic looked again, she was clad in a skin tight latex bodysuit. The suit resembled Eggman's outfit, but the red was replaced with pink, and high heeled boots were on her feet. Eggman's grinning logo was present on the front and back of her new suit, and Eggman logo earrings hung from her ears.

Sonic ran a hand over the suit, feeling the smoothness of the material.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: He gets something more unique.

choices: Sonic is already completely consumed by the corruption.
Sonic still has some free will.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As Sonic looked down at herself, she began to feel... good! It looked beautiful on her! It hugged her figure in ways she never knew could be good! The pink went really well with her blue fur, and latex was just perfect! Cool and close, and riding up in all the right places.

"Oh my god... this is great!"
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic likes the new suit

choices: She sets off to find Eggman
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic continued to run her hands over her new suit, enjoying the feeling of the material.

Noticing the symbols on the suit, she realised that Eggman must be responsible for her current situation. Although she wasn't completely happy about it, she did have to admit that this uniform was nice, and so comfortable to wear. Sonic had always mocked the uniforms Eggman's troops had worn in the past, but now she had one, she had to admit, it did feel great.

Thinking carefully, Sonic decided that she should probably do something about what had happened this morning. Tails would most likely be able to help, but a little idea popped up in her head, maybe Eggman would be able to help her? After all, the uniform was his doing, and it was so pretty.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic still has some free will.

choices: Eggman makes his presence known, he wants her to give herself to him personally.
Eggman rushes home, he wants to watch her surrender to a common robot.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"I really should find the someone who knows what he's doing with this sort of thing." Sonic said, squeezing her breast. "I'd better find Eggman!"

With that, she stood up, carefully balancing on her new heels.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She sets off to find Eggman

choices: The robot takes her to Eggman
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic considered how best to find Eggman, she was sure that he had a base nearby, so she set off in the direction she thought it was.

She had quickly adapted to moving in her new boots, and covered the ground quickly.

Spotting Eggman's base, she noticed that a Eggpawn was guarding the gate.

"I know!" She exclaimed. "I'll ask the Eggpawn to help me find Eggman!"

Feeling pleased with herself, she strutted forward towards the base.

"Halt!" The Eggpawn stated, noticing her approach. "Surrender to the Eggman Empire!" The robot added.

Sonic thought to herself quickly, this Eggpawn certainly wanted to help her, so she should obey its commands. After all, it was a servant of Eggman.

"I surrender!" She said to the robot. "Please help me find Eggman!"

The robot seized her in its hands, and began to carry her into the base. For some reason, the experience of surrendering to the robot led to a strange feeling overtaking her body. It felt good, really good. She pondered this as the robot carried her further into the base.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman rushes home, he wants to watch her surre...

choices: "... back to normal!" (She's still in control, if a little addled... for now)
"... into a slave!" (She's lost her grip already)
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The Eggpawn marched through the base, past machines and minions of all levels. From the bottom-rung Badniks and rubber-clad organic drones (Mobians and humans encased in latex suits that hid their identities, brainwashed into mindless anonymity), to the more high-ranking robots and Legionnaires, and even some willing allies, all of whom glanced at her appearance in surprise. Some of them looked a little aroused, while others seemed to find the whole thing very amusing.

As she looked at the slaves, the Mobians who had their free will stolen from them, she felt something start to grow within her. A need to be like them. It was hard to believe, and harder to explain, but she almost wanted them to do that to her, to dull her mind until she couldn't think straight anymore, then suit her up.

Watching from above, Eggman grinned madly, spotting the Eggpawn carry her toward the factory.

While letting Sonic submit herself to the droids was amusing, her conversion into a slave wouldn't be as satisfying without his own personal input. He wanted to aid the process, shape Sonic into the perfect servant. Of course he could let her just get turned into any old drone, and he couldn't lie, that would certainly be amusing, but he felt that the destruction of his nemesis needed more of a personal touch.

Taking a seat in his office, the mad doctor activated the Eggpawn's override. The droid paused, then turned on its heel and began marching toward his office instead. Sonic wasn't sure where she was being taken now. Could robots get lost? Or was there something else happening? She hoped it wouldn't be bad...

Much to her relief, and even delight, the robot soon arrived outside Eggman's main office. The door slid open with a quite hiss, and Eggman turned his chair around to see the two enter. The Eggpawn approached him stiffly, then, as if on command, dropped Sonic to the floor. She grunted softly at the pain, and then rose to her feet, looking up at the man who had changed her.

"Eggman, I need your help!" She said pleadingly. Eggman's lips curled into a half-smile, as Sonic clasped her hands together, arms squeezing her already large bosom forward. "Please, I need you to turn me..."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The robot takes her to Eggman

choices: Sonic reconsiders, and tries to leave
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Why, I'll be happy to!" The doctor said calmly.

Sonic was taken back by the doctors reply, surely he couldn't mean that, could he?

"Don't act all surprised my dear, after all, I've always been the perfect gentleman." Eggman added, supressing a laugh. "Tell you what, if you can complete some simple tests, I'll do whatever you wish." He said.

Sonic thought carefully, there must be some trick here...

Eggman seemed to sense her thoughts, "no tricks, just complete the tests to my satisfaction, that's all!"

Sonic considered that she didn't really have much choice in the matter, and conceded with a nod of her head.

"Very well!" Exclaimed Eggman. "The Eggpawn will show you the way!"

Sonic followed the Eggpawn out of the room, meanwhile Eggman flicked open his computer and studied the plans for the tests he had set. He grinned madly, each one was designed to corrupt the hedgehog girl, moulding her into the perfect slave. By the end of the process, she would be begging him to make her his slave! He laughed to himself, this should be most entertaining.

Sonic arrived at a large building and was ushered inside, the door closing with a clang.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: "... back to normal!" (She's still ...

choices: Sonic sticks to the deal, and allows the Badniks to capture her
Sonic decides to renege on the deal
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic started to walk forward into the darkness, when a bright light began to glow all around her. The light was intense, and she was forced to close her eyes to block it out. When she opened them again, she stared around in wonder.

This was the green hill zone, how could she be here? What could Eggman possibly want her to do for this challenge?

Taking in her surroundings, she heard a great deal of noise and clanking coming from over a hill, accompanied by clouds of dirty black smoke. The tell tale sign of small, badly designed engines.

Shrugging her shoulders, she set off towards the source of the noise and smoke, and on reaching the brow of the hill, discovered their source.

As she had expected, Badniks of all kinds milled around, and looking carefully, she could see that they had were busy rounding up animals, and forcing them into a Badnik production machine, making more of their kind.

Thinking carefully, Sonic remembered this situation. This was like the first time she had met Eggman all those years before! Why would the doctor create this task for her? She had beaten him easily, did he really want a re-run?

Sonic thought back to her conversation with the doctor, "complete the tasks to my satisfaction" he had said.

Does that mean she should lose this battle?

The more she thought about it, the more it made sense, so it was a trick of sorts! Eggman had twisted his words carefully, she sighed. Losing would be a new experience for her, but she seemed to be having lots of new experiences today, and some of them, she had to admit, had been fun.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Time for the first test

choices: She becomes a regular Green Hill Badnik.
She is given a special suit.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Oh what the hell, it's try it..." She murmured. She walked toward the robots, which turned toward her.

"SURRENDER." The robots droned, heading toward her.

"Okay." She said, raising her hands. A Buzzbomber flew down, and grabbed her, pulling her arms behind her back, then lifted her up. It carried her into the machine, and dropped her into the chute. She slid down it, light rapidly dimming, as she landed on the conveyer belt. It began to whir, pushing her forward, arms grabbing hold of her body as they began to assemble the Badnik armour around her.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic sticks to the deal, and allows the Badnik...

choices: Sonic is ready for the next test
Sonic wants to be a Badnik again
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Losing to the Badniks, and being captured so easily was a new experience for Sonic, but there was something about it, something she couldn't quite understand. She, for lack of a better description, seemed to actually enjoy it. Being at the mercy of her enemies sent a tingling sensation down her spine, and she relished it.

Sonic's attention was pulled back to her current situation as she progressed deeper into the Badnik processing machine. Sonic had always had nightmares about being captured and imprisoned inside a Badnik, but now that it was about to happen, she felt a odd sense of peace and relaxation.

She had no time to think further as she was curled up tightly, and held securely. She couldn't see, but could feel the Badnik shell slowly being built around her. Eventually the process was completed, and Sonic's vision returned as the Badnik's optical sensors came online.

An access door opened on the Badnik processing machine, and a new Crabmeat Badnik scuttled out slowly. Inside, Sonic watched as she took her place alongside the other Badniks.

Sonic had always pitied those animals unfortunate enough to become Badniks, even for a short while. But now she had experienced it, she decided that she had been mistaken. Her Badnik was comfortable, safe, and she didn't have to worry about anything anymore. Sonic sensed the Badnik programming melding with her mind, and felt the irresistible urge to obey. Being a lowly minion was so easy, orders were passed down, and you simply obeyed. It felt so good...

The Crabmeat scuttled off slowly, ready to help the other Badniks to capture more animals. Sonic settled in to her new home, particularly enjoying the slow speed she was travelling at.

Unbeknown to the hedgehog girl, the green hill zone began to slowly fade away, replaced with the blank metal walls of Eggman's building. This was a simulation area, Eggman could create any location or item he required temporary. It was normally used to test his inventions and plans, today it had another purpose.

Sonic was awoken from her peaceful bliss as the Crabmeat fell apart, dumping her on the floor.

She stood up and dusted herself off, and looking down at the remains of the Badnik, several emotions washed over her. She was on one hand, embarrassed that she had let herself be captured, but on the other, she had for some reason, somehow enjoyed the experience. She stared at the Badnik for one last time, not without a tinge of regret that her time as a Badnik had been so short.

A large screen flicked into life in front of her, and was swiftly filled with Eggman's grinning form. Sonic felt compelled to pay close attention to the doctor, and another feeling swelled up inside her body, was that almost admiration? She quickly dismissed the thought.

"I see you passed the first test, well done!" The doctor laughed.

"Are you ready for the next one?" He asked, chuckling.

Sonic thought carefully, and found herself looking back at the smashed Crabmeat, which for some reason excited her so.

"Or would you prefer something else maybe?" Eggman probed.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She becomes a regular Green Hill Badnik.

choices: She finds Eggman, demanding the Chaos Emeralds first.
She finds Tails, held in a tube-like machine first.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"I'm ready for the next test, Eggman." Sonic declared. She tried to gather her confidence, and put the strange feelings about the Badnik shell and the comfortable submission and obedience out of her head. She could do this! She could play along with Eggman's little game and come out the other side just fine... RIght?

"Then, we shall begin..." Eggman's voice echoed back. The door to the next chamber opened, and Sonic jogged toward it, at a slightly slower pace than before. No sense wasting energy now, right? "Your next challenge will be twofold. You must complete two tasks to overcome it."

The door closed behind him, and faded as the simulation took over. Crystalling buildings surrounded him, night sky visible through the windows. She remembered this place! It was where Eggman had held Tails prisoner, when he'd kidnapped the little fox and demanded a ransom of the Chaos Emeralds in exchange for his release. In the end, she had beaten him senseless and he released Tails quickly to avoid her pummelling him and destroying more of his base.

It didn't take a genius to realise why there were two stages here: There were two things she had done to rebel against Eggman, not surrendering the Emeralds and stealing Tails back...

She continued down the corridor, feeling the presence of the Emeralds within her. SHe'd only had six, and Eggman apparently already had the seventh. There was no chance of Super Sonic here...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic is ready for the next test

choices: Sonic moves on to the next test
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic travelled along the path, she wasn't at full speed, not giving much thought to why she didn't feel like zooming around at the moment.

Soon enough she arrived at the end of the path, and entered a familiar looking chamber. At one end sat Eggman, protected by a glass screen. Sonic remembered this being a tough fight, but she had prevailed in the end.

This time however, she considered that the outcome would most likely have to be different. Certainly if she wanted to pass Eggman's test, anyway.

As she entered the chamber, Eggman's voice cracked over the loudspeaker system. "Surrender the emeralds, and I'll take you to your friend!"

Sighing, Sonic gathered up the six emeralds she had, and placed them on the floor in front of Eggman.

Eggman for his part, smiled cruelly, while the glass screen withdrew. "Good girl." He said. "Now follow me." He commanded.

For some reason, Sonic felt a tingle of pleasure roll down her spine when Eggman had praised her, it felt so good to be praised and to submit wilfully. She shook her head, trying to think clearly, what was wrong with her?

She passed through the area formally protected by the screen, and followed Eggman deeper into the base. Eventually they came to a wider area, and found Tails held securely in a glass tube.

Eggman spoke again. "Here is your friend, safety held. Since you were so happy to let me have the chaos emeralds, maybe you would like me to look after Tails?" Eggman asked. "I promise he'll be happy as a Badnik slave!"

A monitor screen displayed a Badnik version of Tails, the model spinning slowly. The feelings Sonic had experienced when she was a Badnik came rushing back, the pleasure and comfort of being a lowly slave...

To pass the test, Sonic knew she would have to give Tails up. She didn't however expect it to feel like this, she almost wanted Tails to be a Badnik, she knew he would enjoy it, just as she had. Another thought flashed through her mind, what if she was captured by Badnik Tails? Then forced to join him as a Badnik? She shuddered inwardly, but not with fear, but with some sort of twisted desire. What was going on in her head?

Sonic looked Tails in the eyes, then looked down at the floor, blushing uncontrollably. "You can have him." She managed to say.

Eggman didn't need to be told twice, and the tube promptly disappeared into the floor. A short while later, a Badnik entered the room from another doorway. Catching the light, Sonic noticed it was the Tails Badnik.

Eggman spoke to her again. "Well done!" He praised. "You will find the next test through that door over there." He said, extending an arm outwards.

Sonic shuffled forwards, then looked back, staring at the Badnik her best friend was now trapped inside. Eggman noticed her hesitation, "perhaps you would like to stay with you friend?" He asked, "I'm sure he will be happy to capture and convert you!"
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She finds Eggman, demanding the Chaos Emeralds ...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic looked at the metal fox, staring balefully at her. She pondered whether the boy inside could see her, or hear her. Was he foolishly pleading for her to break his new home open and "save" him, or had he already woken up to the truth that Eggman had revealed to her? She wouldn't be finding out, she reasoned. SHe knew this was a simulation. He wasn't really there. And, really, she hoped that his education would be as pleasurable and enlightening as hers.

As she watched him approaching her, she mused on the simulation's effects... After she had submitted to Eggman's machines in the last test, the simulation had ended. If this sim hadn't ended yet, then she hadn't completed it yet! She had yet to pass! SHe had to do something else to please him! She bit her lip, mind racing as she tried to figure out a solution. What could she have missed? What hadn't she done to satisfy him?

"... perhaps you would like to stay with you friend?" He asked, "I'm sure he will be happy to capture and convert you!"

Realisation hit her, and she immediately raised her hands.

"I surrender!" The Tails Badnik grabbed her wrists, pulling behind her back, as it began to manhandle her toward the machine.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic wants to stay

choices: The simulation fades away, time for the next test
Sonic wants to remain like this
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic tried to reassure herself that this was just a simulation, and she just wanted to pass the stupid tests.

But as the Tails Badnik dragged her across the room, she once more began to feel oddly good about her treatment. She had betrayed her best friend, condemning him to be enslaved, and now the same thing was about to happen to her. But why was she so happy about it? A smile broke out across her face as she was roughly forced into the glass tube, and the access door slammed shut.

Eggman merely grinned as the tube descended into the floor, dropping her into another machine. Once more she was curled up, and her vision faded as a Badnik suit was build around her.

Soon she noticed her vision returning, as her Badnik exited the machine. Catching a reflection in the shiny metalwork of a wall, she noticed that her Badnik resembled her former appearance very closely. It was a Sonic Badnik, but clearly still female. It seemed Eggman designed this processing machine to create a Badnik based on the subject.

Sonic felt a warm glow pass through her body as the Badnik AI started to take over her mind. She did not resist, the urge to submit being far too strong.

A door opened, and she passed through it, taking her place beside the Tails Badnik, awaiting orders from Eggman.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman watches, amused.

choices: She finds herself on the Little Planet.
She finds herself on Angel Island.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The simulation faded, and she found herself in another empty room. The Badnik shell broke apart around her and fell to the ground. On closer inspection it looked more like a costume than an actual robot. She sighed, an uneasy mixture of melancholy at the relaxing bliss being gone, and relief that the strange effect it was having on her brain was gone.

She had to get through these tests and escape before Eggman messed with her head any more.

"Ready for the next test, Miss Hedgehog?" The dictator's mocking voice spoke up, taunting her. She gritted her teeth slightly at the false "respect" he was giving her.

"Sure, go for it..." She said, not sure whether she was fearing her incoming ordeal... or anticipating it...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The simulation fades away, time for the next test

choices: Eggman has something else in mind
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic closed her eyes against the bright light, and when she opened them found herself on the little planet.

Once she had used the legendary time stones to break Eggman's hold on this place, travelling back in time to destroy the robot generators he had placed, saving the future. She had then beaten her doppelganger in a race across stardust speedway, leaving Eggman fuming.

She sensed that this would probably not be the case this time...

Sonic sensed a strange presence, and looking down, found herself in possession of the time stones. She looked up again, and noticed in front of her, several packed up crates, stamped up with the words "robot generator".

She thought for a short moment and realised that her task this time must be to help Eggman take over the little planet, rather than freeing it from his grasp.

She signed, and decided that it was better to just get on with the task, the sooner she was done with it, the sooner she would be closer to the end.

She collected one of the crates, and using the time stones, swiftly placed it in the past. The generator for its part, whirled into life, and Sonic wasted no time in warping back to the present.

The green and pleasant zone she had recently been standing in was gone. Instead, she found a ruined and toxic wasteland, filled with factories spewing filthy fumes into the air. Robots scurried around, attentive to their work. Eggman's grinning logo was everywhere.

Sonic looked at the sight before her, but for some reason couldn't bring herself to be disgusted by it. Everything here had purpose, everything was busy, everything was orderly. Maybe Eggman's influence on the little planet wasn't such a bad thing?

Before Sonic could think any more on the subject, Eggman floated into view in his Eggpod. Next to Eggman, Sonic noticed a familiar sight, Metal Sonic.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She finds herself on the Little Planet.

choices: Sonic immediately pulls the lever, turning Amy into a Badnik.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As the blue robot drew nearer, Sonic spotted the young Amy Rose clutched in his claws.

"S-Sonic!?" She gasped. "You're working for Eggman? And you're a girl!?"

"Ignore her, Sonic." Eggman smirked, as Metal shoved Amy into the Robot Generator. It closed around her, and the side of the machine opened, exposing a lever.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman has something else in mind

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Well Sonic, here's your chance." Said Eggman. "You've always found Amy annoying, why not be rid of the problem?" He asked. "Simply pull the level, and she'll be a loyal Badnik slave!"

Sonic thought about Amy carefully, she was obsessed with chasing her, and always getting into trouble. Wanting something that always seemed out of reach must have been very difficult for Amy, and made her very unhappy.

Sonic remembered the experience of being converted into a Badnik, the blissful feeling of simply being a lowly slave, and obeying orders. A tingle ran down her spine, as she relived the memory.

Amy would be much happier as a Badnik, part of Sonic's mind began to reason.

Before she could think any more on the subject, Sonic found she had reached out and pulled the lever. The machine hummed briefly, then the doors opened and a Badnik Amy stepped out. For some reason, Sonic much preferred the look of Badnik Amy. The sleek look of the metal chassis, and the shininess of the paintwork captivated Sonic's attention.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic waits for an explanation.

choices: Eggman wants Sonic to surrender herself to Amy, this time.
Eggman has something different in mind.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: The Badnik Amy began to approach Sonic, as Eggman watched, grinning.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman has more planned

choices: Eggman has a task for the new Badniks
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As the Badnik began to move towards her, Sonic realised that the simulation had not ended yet, and that Eggman must want something else.

Remembering the experience with Tails, Sonic wondered if this was a similar case...

Either way, as Sonic looked at the Badnik Amy had become, she started to notice a strange feeling creeping up on her. She remembered submitting to the Tails Badnik, and the wonderful feeling as she had been dragged across the room, and thrown into a Badnik processing machine.

Unable to reason why, but feeling compelled to do so, Sonic found herself actively surrendering to the Amy Badnik. She did not resist as the Badnik dragged her over to the robot generator. Once again, a strangely pleasant feeling overcame her as she realised that, once again she would soon be enclosed in a Badnik.

True to her suspicions, the Amy Badnik wasted no time in shoving her inside the robot generator, and quickly pulling the level.

The machine hummed into life, and Sonic found herself held securely as her body was analysed. Soon, she felt metal plates surrounding her body, and felt the cold embrace of the Badnik shell, as it sealed closed around her.

The machine completed the cycle, and the door opened. A Sonic Badnik stepped out, and quickly moved to stand beside the Amy Badnik, awaiting orders from Eggman. Inside, Sonic noticed the warm relaxing feeling of the Badnik AI taking over her mind.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman wants Sonic to surrender herself to Amy,...

choices: Eggman sends them to put generators in the past on Mobius too.
Eggman sends them to capture their friends too.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
This time, the simulation didn't end when the AI took over. As the two hedgehog robots saluted their Master, he grinned, andbegan to speak.

"Well, my little slaves... I have a mission for you two to undertake." He commanded.

"We hear and obey."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman has a task for the new Badniks

choices: The simulation is over, time for the next test
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Go and capture your former friends!" He shouted. "They are approaching the entrance to my factory, you know what to do!" He smirked.

The two robots promptly turned on their heels and marched off. As her Badnik marched along, Sonic again began to enjoy the feeling of being trapped inside a Badnik shell. She was curled up so conformably, and the Badnik AI soothed her mind with constant reassurance that she was obeying her master. Obey, that was all that mattered, to obey felt so good. Sonic began to realise that she must show her friends how good if felt to obey her Master.

Reaching the entrance of the factory, she noticed Tails approaching.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman sends them to capture their friends too.

choices: They convert him into a new Fem-Badnik.
They put him in a capsule and go for more victims.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: The two hedgehog Badniks leapt forward. Sonic's shell grabbed hold of him, holding him still, as Amy's swung her new hammer down, clonking the fox on the head. He yelped in pain, then lost consciousness.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Badniks capture Tails

choices: The simulation is over, time for the next test
Another part of this task remains
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The Badniks dragged Tails' unconscious body along the floor, heading towards the robot generator.

Inside her Badnik, Sonic felt a tingle of excitement as Tails was quickly thrown inside, and the machine hummed into life.

A short while later, the door opened and a vixen Badnik resembling Tails stepped out. The new Badnik halted, before speaking clearly "This unit obeys Master Eggman!"

Sonic knew this was just a simulation, Tails or Amy were not really here. Still, she wondered how much the two would enjoy Badnik conversion, if they would come to realise the true that she had. She began to imagine watching the real Amy and Tails being converted into Badniks, and for some reason hoped she could be there, and maybe even help...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: They convert him into a new Fem-Badnik.

choices: Eggman decides to question Sonic to check her progress.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Ultimately, the test had to end, and as Sonic lapsed into a trance and dumbly enjoyed watching her and her two sister Badniks using the Time Stones to aid their Master, the simulation ended, and Sonic woke up in her organic body, still in the holographic chamber.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The simulation is over, time for the next test

choices: Sonic wants to continue the tests
Sonic wants to serve Eggman now
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"So Sonic, how are you enjoying the challenge so far?" Eggman grinned.

The hedgehog girl found herself thinking carefully. Normally she would have replied with a quick insult to Eggman, but for some reason, she couldn't bring herself to think of one.

She felt strange, a part of her remembered the challenges, the way she had been made to submit to Eggman. It felt, well... good somehow.

Surely she couldn't give up now...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman decides to question Sonic to check her p...

choices: Eggman sends her into the next test.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: "I'm ready to continue." She replied, looking up at the cameras watching her. She could go further, she could beat them... At least, she thought... maybe she just wanted to feel the simulations controlling and comforting her again.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic wants to continue the tests

choices: She heads off to locate Knuckles.
She heads off to find the Master Emerald.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The door opened, and Sonic walked through it, finding herself on the lush, green forests of Angel Island. As she took in her surroundings, she tried to think back to her first adventure here... What did she need to do to please Eggman enough to pass the test... What had she done before...

Eggman had tricked Knuckles into fighting her instead of him, butshe was on Eggman's side in these simulations so maybe she had to do the tricking? Or perhaps it was her duty to steal the Master Emerald and put the Death Egg back in the sky? Maybe both would suffice... And of course, tricking the echidna into becoming a Badnik and then submitting to the process herself, as was usually the rule.


From his control room, Eggman watched and grinned. THe previous trials had led Sonic by the nose somewhat. He presented her with fairly obvious solutions, and let her go from there. However, with each of the tests, he'd gradually made it a little less clear. It was making the captive hedgehog actively think about ways she could please him, forcing her to act in his favour on her own accord.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman sends her into the next test.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic figured that if she found the Master Emerald, Knuckles wouldn't be far away.

She almost smiled as she considered how easy it usually was to trick the gullible Echidna, this would be simple, and possibly even fun!

She noticed a small building up ahead, Eggman's logo painted on the side. Venturing inside she found various Egg-mobiles, each fitted with various tools. She remembered these! There was the flame mobile that set fire to the trees, the freeze spraying one, and the depth charge dropping one! Looking around, her eyes settled on the Egg-mobile she wanted...

Using the Egg-mobile the hedgehog hurried to the hidden palace, and recalling the route from her former adventures, she soon arrived.

Sonic beheld the Master Emerald on its alter, glowing dimly. Even better, that Knucklehead was asleep in the corner!

She needed to get rid of the Echidna for a short while, then she could grab the emerald! Parking the Egg-mobile safely, she walked over to Knuckles sleeping form, and booted him hard.

Knuckles jolted awake, and sprang to his feet. "What's happening!?! Who are you?"

"Help! Someone is stealing the Master Emerald!" Sonic cried, playing the part of the damsel in distress well.

Knuckles rushed over to the Emerald, and noticed it was still in place. Before he could realise what had happed, Sonic floated down in the Egg-mobile, and deployed the electrical shock system. The wires snaked around Knuckles, and the electrical charge flung him across the room, knocked out cold.

Sonic picked up the Master Emerald with the Egg-mobiles grabber, then collected the unconscious Echidna, and carted the lot off out of the hidden palace.

Returning to the surface, she found Eggman was waiting for her, along with a host of Badniks.
