Eggman grinned madly as she approached. "Good girl, the Master Emerald and a prisoner!" He exclaimed. "What should we do with him?" He asked.

Sonic thought carefully, another choice to make...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She heads off to find the Master Emerald.

choices: Eggman wants her and Knuckles to install the Emerald in the Death Egg.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic new exactly the right answer after all these tests, and replied simply with a satisfied smile.

"He has to become a Badnik, of course!" She said.

"Indeed he does." Eggman grinned, presenting her with a Badnik shell shaped like Knuckles. Wasting no time, she dropped the red echidna in, and watched as it sealed up and came online. After a few seconds of running through its own checks, it stood at attention and saluted Eggman.

"What will he be used for?"

"Probably protecting the Master Emerald chamber on the Death Egg. Let's just hope he's better at protecting it now, eh?" The rotund scientist chuckled. Sonic hadto admit that it was pretty funny, and giggled along with him. "In any case, I think you know what comes next, don't you?"

As he spoke, two more robots presented her with another busty Badnik babe body. This one had a visor over its eyes, wheels on its high-heeled feet, and was taller than the usual ones. All in all, it looked like a pointlessly sexy copy of Mecha Sonic. Not as fun as her last one, but a thematically appropriate one.

Sonic jumped down from her Eggmobile, walking up to the shell and allowing herself to be entombed again. As it closed around her, the visor lit up, allowing her to see, as she drifted into her usual daze.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Convert him into a Badnik

choices: Sonic tries to resist the Dark Gaia energy.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The simulation slowly faded from view and once again, Sonic was alone in the chamber.

The view rapidly changed, and a city street at night materialized around her, it seemed a little familiar to the hedgehog, like she had been here before. She wondered what her mission was this time in this area? So far she had been made to see how her former life had caused so many problems for Eggman, and forced to atone for these actions by righting the wrong.

She could hear noises up ahead, so she set off down the street, not realizing that she was moving in an increasing slower and suggestive manner as the challenges progressed. As the hedgehog progressed, she began to feel a little strange, like she noticed a presence, it was a little familiar, but something she couldn't quite remember, like she had forced the memory from her mind.

Rounding the corner of the street, she noticed something she hoped never to see again, Dark Gaia's minions!

A shiver ran down her spine, that explained the strange feeling she was having, the evil of these creatures seemed to have a force of its own, spreading dread and fear to anyone close enough. It seemed that Eggman had some means of generating these creatures, in small numbers anyway. Sonic reasoned it wasn't too unexpected, since he had ample time to study them.

The bimbo considered her next move, back when she had fought these creatures, they had been in the service of Eggman. Yet she had destroyed them, was this the wrong she was to correct?

Deciding that there was only one way to find out, she waited while the creatures slowly advanced towards her, there were several Nightmares, their stronger cousins Deep Nightmares, an assortment of the smaller creatures, and even a Dark Master. There would be little chance of her defeating them in a battle, so she hoped that she had made the correct choice!

As one of the Nightmares approached her, the feeling of dread seemed to start to melt away, to be replaced with something else, like a soft voice deep in her mind, promising to help ease her worries.

Another thought entered her head, she had once been filled with Dark Gaia energy herself, and it had taken all her strength to resist. She wasn't sure she could resist this time around, or indeed if she even wanted to.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Test complete!

choices: She is transformed into a Dark Gaia minion
She is possessed by Dark Gaia
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The influence of the creature approaching her was too much for the hedgehog girl to process, gripped with fear on one hand, and a growing desire on the other, she remained rooted to the spot, unable to either fight or escape.

The Nightmare, for its part took no hurry in approaching its victim, sensing that she was unable to escape, it simple slowly waddled towards her.

Sonic felt the corrupting presence of the creature growing stronger and stronger. Internally her thoughts screamed at her to get away, but the small reassuring voice was growing stronger and stronger with each passing moment. It promised so much, pleasures, endless pleasures could be hers, if only she would trust the voice, and give in to its guidance.

Lost in the trance, Sonic offered no resistance as the Nightmare gripped her shoulders tightly and dragged her towards the group of remaining creatures. The fear was now gone from her body, having given herself over to the corrupting influence of her captor.

The creatures spread out, forming a circle around her, as the leader of the group, a Dark Master stepped forward.

The voice in Sonic's head became deafening, drowning out all other thoughts, as this much more powerful creature stepped forward, engulfing her in its corrupting influence. The urge to submit became irresistible, and Sonic fell to her knees as she found herself bowing before the dark being.

The voice in her head changed again, as it began to demand more, perfect submission was required for her to achieve the pleasures promised. Sonic was too far lost now, anything they demanded she would willingly give.

The Dark Master began to cast some sort of spell as arcane symbols appeared in the air and clouds of dark energy surrounded Sonic.

The girl felt a presence trying to enter her body, demanding control. She submitted without hesitation.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic gives in.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The feeling overcoming her body was not completely unusual for Sonic, she had felt something similar before, when Eggman had drained the chaos energy from her former body and used it to free Dark Gaia.

Back then she had resisted viciously as her body had been changed by Dark Gaia's presence, her former self had eventually overcome the presence and regained control.

There would be no such foolishness this time.

Dark thoughts and desires bubbled through her mind as changes spread over her body. Her fur darkened, and grew out, muscle mass spread over her body and razor sharp claws and fangs slid into position.

She was a Werehog again, but the way the Werehog was always supposed to be, a minion of Dark Gaia and a willing slave of evil.

Her tongue licked over her fangs as she thought about the all innocents she would be able to enslave and corrupt, Dark Gaia's presence within her urging her to do so.

Minimal clothing appeared on her new body, the now familiar spiked sneakers along with a new addition, a large spiked collar around her neck, with a shiny Eggman logo proudly hanging from it.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She is transformed into a Dark Gaia minion

choices: Eggman has one final test for her.
Eggman intends to run her through every battle they've ever had.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Once again, Sonic found herself back on the floor of the lab, her transformation a mere mental illusion. She seemed less disappointed this time. The dark, seductive submission was fun, but it didn't compare to the perfection of a Badnik.

So far, she had aced every test. She knew she had. And she was starting to wonder if there were any more past adventures that she had to make amends for. She'd learned the joy of submitting to Eggman, of becoming a Badnik, of helping her friends submit to Eggman, and of providing him with all the Emeralds he could ask for. She wasn't sure if there was anything left.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Test complete!

choices: Eggman is disappointed that she didn't make it further, for some reason...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Being made to serve, over and over again... it had felt good... good in ways that she couldn't understand. She had been made to feel safe, and comfortable, and relaxed... obedience felt positively blissful. She couldn't deny that she wanted to continue serving... she wanted to obey...

"I... I want to serve..." She murmured.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic wants to serve Eggman now

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Eggman began to laugh at his longtime nemesis' final surrender, as he prepared her for...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman is thrilled.

choices: begged him to make it so!
Asked if she could serve him in some other way
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman looked down at the Hedgehog girl with glee, he wanted to saver this moment, and enjoy his victory.

"Since you enjoyed being a Badnik so much, how would you like to make it permanent?" He asked Sonic. "My new type of Badnik can slowly covert its organic battery into a fully fledged robot!" He added. "The best part is, once the conversion is complete, you can never be turned back!"

Sonic thought carefully, slow conversion into a mindless slave, never having to think for herself or ever have any worries again, forever enslaved to her Masters will, and no possibility of rescue by her friends.

She felt a shudder of excitement run through her body, it sounded blissful!

She looked up at Eggman, and
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Something a little more special.

choices: Eggman wants to hear her beg more.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: "Yes, Master, please!" She squealed. "I want to be a mindless mechanical slave for the rest of my life! I beg you, please, let be turned by the roboticizer Badnik!"
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: begged him to make it so!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman continued to look down, as his former adversary wilfully surrendered to him. His smile widened as Sonic continued to beg him to enslave her.

"Please, Master!" She continued. "I want to serve you as your lowest and most basic slave!" She pleaded. "Take away my individuality, and destroy my free will!"

Sonic looked up at her Master, "I was a thorn in your side for so long, allow me to make up for my past transgressions."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman wants to hear her beg more.

choices: In her excitement, Sonic runs straight there.
Sonic walks slowly, like a good slave should.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
After Sonic's pleas for enslavement dried up, Eggman waited, watching the girl's face, letting her stew in the silence. As her excited fervour faded, she slowly started to look nervous. it was reasonably obvious that she was starting to fear he would reject her. Then, just when she looked like she might cry, he leaned forward to the microphone.

"Report to the Badnik Processing Plant ASAP." He said, before leaving his control room.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman grants her request

choices: She want some more information first
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman hurried away to make the necessary preparations, while in contrast Sonic slowly strutted her way across the base towards the Badnik processing plant. She was excited that her Master had been kind enough to grant her request, but she knew that he enjoyed watching her moving slowly in contrast to her former self. For this reason, she would take her time to arrive, and reflect on the blessing she was about to be granted.

Eventually she arrived at the plant, and found her Master waiting for her, his smile grew ever wider as she slowly strode over, and bowed before him.

Eggman for his part, had made the modifications required to the Badnik processor, and was keen to get started. "Your new Badnik will slowly convert you, it will take time, but don't be afraid. Use this time wisely, learn what it is to be a Badnik, and you will serve me well once your conversation is complete!" He explained.

Sonic quivered with excitement, it was finally going to happen, soon she would be a mindless servant for real!

Eggman spoke again." Now show your devotion to me, and walk into the processing machine!"
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic walks slowly, like a good slave should.

choices: The machine determines her compatibility with existing Badnik units.
The machine starts to create a new Badnik, just for her.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Yes, my Master!" She beamed, saluting him, as a good slave should. She then turned, and marched slowly into the waiting grip of the machine. A pair of mechanical arms lifted her up, placing her on the conveyer belt, as her ankles were cuffed to it.

"Good girl. Now, enjoy your... beauty treatment." Eggman grinned, pulling the lever, as the machine began to roll forward, taking her into the heart of its systems.

"Yes Master!" She giggled, disappearing from his sight. Satisfied, Eggman moved to the control room, ready to watch his new pet's conversion.


Within the bowels of the machine, scanning beams ran over her body, and screens around her began to display information and data, including her name, age, species, gender, and measurements.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic obeys Eggman

choices: Eggman sends the new Badnik on patrol, so Sonic can gain experiance as a Badnik.
Eggman keeps the Badnik close by during Sonic's conversion.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic giggled excitedly as she waited for the machine to complete the calculations. As much as she had enjoyed the experience of the simulations, she was delighted that this was finally to happen for real.

Soon she would be a Badnik for real.

Soon she would be a mindless slave to her Master.

Even better, her Master had told her that this Badnik would slowly convert her into a robot herself. She would not be a power source in a robotic shell, but a pure 100% Badnik, forever.

Her friends would never be able to save her, for even if they found her, they could not reverse the process.

Finally, she thought, no more running, just blissful submission.

She remembered what her Master had said, she was to pay attention and learn while her conversion was underway. This would teach her how to be a good Badnik, ready for service.

Her mind was snapped back to attention as the conveyor belt rolled forward, the computer completing the calculations.

Once again she found herself curled up, and a Badnik shell built around her body. Only this time, it was for real.

A hatchway on the machine opened, and a new roller Badnik waddled slowly forward, the new unit halted in front of Eggman.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The machine determines her compatibility with e...

choices: Th patrol is easy and dull.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
With Sonic safely contained inside the new roller Badnik, Eggman was ready for the next stage of his plan.

The bimbo needed to learn what it was to serve as a Badnik, then she would be ready when the conversion was completed.

Eggman had designed the conversion machinery integrated within the Roller carefully, it was fully integrated with Sonic's mind. Put simply, the more she considered herself a Badnik mentally, the more she would be converted into a Badnik physically. The process was capable of transforming her into almost any kind of Badnik, selecting the most appropriate one based on her mental development.

To ensure that Sonic gained as much experience as possible, Eggman would send the Badnik out on patrol. Nothing too risky, but if she was to serve as a basic front line unit, then this was the place for her.

For her part, Sonic was for the moment happily curled up inside the Roller. She was enjoying the feeling of being a Badnik again, and couldn't wait for her complete physical conversion. In the meantime, she hoped that she could help capture some animals to make into lovely new Badniks like herself.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman sends the new Badnik on patrol, so Sonic...

choices: It's a large assault by her former friends.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Unfortunately for Eggman, his planned easy patrol for Sonic to get used to her new life was interrupted, when the city wall was blown in nearby.

As one of the nearest Badniks, Sonic's Roller began to slowly walk toward the disturbance. Despite the danger, she felt excited. Eager to prove her worth to Master, to experience the combat that she would soon be engaged in.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The new Badnik enters combat.

choices: Eggman orders Sonic's Roller to "process" the prisoners
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As the smoke and dust cleared, the Roller noticed that only a small force of freedom fighters had entered the base.

Inside her Badnik, Sonic did not know any of them, perhaps a small splinter group, encouraged by Sonic's recent success against Eggman.

They would soon learn they had made a grave mistake thinking that Eggman was weakened, indeed Sonic hoped they could soon be helping to swell her Masters Badnik forces.

Having waddled into range, the Roller curled up and charged headlong into the invading party. It was a technique Sonic was well used to, and see felt a giddy thrill knowing that her skills were now employed in the service of Eggman.

The Badtnik's charge was well timed, and the small group was forced to split up to avoid being bowled over. This made them easy prey for the Eggpawn forces now arriving on the scene. The Roller uncurled, and Sonic watched as a Eggpawn grabbed a wolf and quickly dragged him off to a waiting prison egg. The fight was progressing poorly for the group that had been foolish enough to attack the base, rapidly outnumbered, they were quickly being captured.

Sonic's Roller noticed a small rabbit trying to sneak away, and quickly grabbed onto him. Despite the rabbit's pleas, the Roller dragged him across the floor, towards the prison egg. Inside the Badnik, Sonic could hear the rabbits frantic pleas for mercy. She quickly dismissed them, her Badnik was just being a good servant of Master Eggman, and all enemies of Eggman must be eliminated. Sonic felt a tremendous wave of satisfaction when the rabbit was tossed into the prison egg, and the hatch slammed closed behind. Her Roller served Eggman well, and she hoped to achieve the same when her transformation was complete.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: It's a small team.

choices: The rest of the patrol is uneventful, allowing her to relax and change more.
Her Roller is called back to her Master.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
With the prisoners secured, the accompanying Eggpawns dragged the pods away. As much as Sonic wanted to aid with their conversion, she knew that her Roller had a job to do, and was poorly--suited to operating the machinery anyway. With no targets left in sight, it resumed its slow-paced waddle.

Moving this slowly was a new experience for Sonic. With its short legs and long feet, the Roller could barely move without curling up into its ball form for attacks. It hobbled along without a hint of haste. She'd felt similarly in the simulations, but it was nothing compared to the real thing. In contrast to her former restlessness and impatience, she felt this to be the single most relaxing feeling she had ever experienced.

Her containment pod inside the Roller was tight, but padded and cushioned, creating a comfortable bed that wrapped itself around her. The electrodes in her head, flooding her brain with hypnotic power, had also deadened most of her nerves, leaving her unable to feel any pain or discomfort. It felt like sleeping on a cloud. The visor on her face, which showed her Roller's view of the world, had been laced with a spiral, and as her thoughts became less dreamlike and more focused and mechanical, she took notice of it, but she offered no resistance, letting it continue its work.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Roller continues the patrol

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic continued watching the view on the visor, willing letting the programming penetrate her brain.

It seemed less like she was watching a screen, and more like what see was seeing was real. She no longer felt sleepy, she began to feel focused.

All the while the programming bored into her mind, drilling into her Eggmans superiority and how she was nothing but a mindless slave.

She accepted it without question.

As the Roller waddled on around the base, Sonic lost track of time. The endless programming doing its work, and as the mental conversion progressed, so did the physical one.

Soon she would be ready to emerge as a fully converted Badnik, not a animal contained in a robotic shell (as much as she had enjoyed it), but a pure Badnik, 100% robotic, 100% loyal, and 100% Eggman's slave, forever.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The rest of the patrol is uneventful, allowing ...

choices: The conversion is complete, she is a pure Badnik
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The Roller continued to patrol the base, on and on, it never tired, or complained, it was a faithful servant.

Thanks to the programming, Sonic no longer considered herself a hedgehog, indeed she no longer considered herself even organic. She was a machine, a Badnik, and her purpose was simple. As a Badnik, she obeyed her Master, would assist him in any purpose, and strives to capture those that resist, to make more Badniks like herself.

Sometime later, an explosion rang out, and all available Badniks concentrated on the area.

Sonic was snapped out of her trance, enemies of Master Eggman had penetrated the base again!

Her Roller moved into position to engage the intruders, but this time one was too quick and managed to land a blow before the Roller could curl up to attack.
The Roller stuttered, and fell over, badly damaged. Her robotic shell damaged, she emerged from the wreckage and looked at her new form.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman decides to wait longer

choices: She is a Roller, but her colours are those of her organic body.
She is a hybrid of her own bimbo-body and the Roller's normal design.
She is mostly still a hedgehog in shape, but she has an Organic Battery chamber.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The light hit her face, optics adjusting as she looked at the Mobian who had damaged her.

>>Organic Battery not detected.

>>Activate Emergency Backup Battery.

>>Beginning attack protocol...


She curled up, rolling into her armoured shell, and launched herself into his gut, forcing the air from his lungs. He collapsed to the ground, wheezing, as one of the accompanying drones set upon him and shoved him into a pod. She turned, barrelling into another invader. These Freedom Fighters would not violate her Master's home, and they would not destroy any more of her sisters!

Soon, the Badniks stood victorious, and, for the first time, the former Sonic got to see her new body. She knew that her shell had been broken before its work was complete, but fortunately, her wonderful Master always made his conversion devices to produce a healthy, functioning robot above all else, and would never put the robot in a state of immobility for longer than a minute or two unless deep within a repair facility. Her becoming a healthy robot was never in doubt. What was in doubt was how far her remodelling from hedgehog to Roller had progressed before it was interrupted.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The conversion is complete, she is a pure Badnik

choices: It's one of her former friends
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
It would seem that the conversion had been fully completed, save for the paint job. Instead of the normal royal blue of a Roller, with silver arms and a red "beak", she was still a Sonic blue, with beige legs, arms and tail.

Having a non-standard appearance was noted by her programming, and measures to correct this would be taken when possible.

In the meantime, there was a more pressing issue.

>>Unit running on emergency power, reserves depleting.

>>Aquire organic battery - High priority.

>>Searching for targets...

She waddled over to the pod, selecting one of the defeated intruders. They would be given the honor of serving Master Eggman sooner than expected, as her organic battery.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: She is a Roller, but her colours are those of h...

choices: The Roller continues to patrol the base
Eggman orders the unit to report to him
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Tails had infiltrated Eggman's base along with some other freedom fighters, they had come to try and damage Eggman's operations, but Tails real interest was in gaining information. Sonic had been missing for some time, but Tails was not unduly concerned. It wasn't unusual for the hedgehog to go away for a week or two, sometimes even longer. Besides, if Eggman had managed to capture him, there was no way the mad doctor would have kept quiet about it.

Things had been going well for a while, until the group was ambushed by some Badniks. Tails was sure he had destroyed a Roller, only for another to appear and barrel into him, stunning him for long enough to allow a Eggpawn to bundle him into a prison pod.

Tails cursed his carelessness, now he would have to escape, or wait until one of his friends managed to save him.

Much to Tails' surprise, the pod began to open. He had expected to be at least transported somewhere else first. Indeed, when a enemy of his caliber was captured, a visit from a gloating Eggman was almost assured.

With the access door fully open, Tails noticed that the Roller Badnik that had been the cause of his capture was standing directly outside the door. It would not be possible to escape without going through the Badnik. Looking carefully, Tails spotted that this Roller did not have the usual colour scheme of its kind, but dismissed it as irreverent.

The Roller moved forward, and seized hold of the fox. Tails did not resist, instead preparing himself for the inevitable meeting with Eggman, to whose presence the Badnik would surely drag him. Once outside the pod, the door closed again, trapping the remaining prisoners inside.

Tails could not spot the crazy doctor anywhere, but he did notice that the Roller grasping him was behaving a bit oddly.

>>Suitable target acquired.

>>Begin installation procedure...

An access port opened on the Roller, and Tails finally noticed what was about to happen. Unfortunately for the fox, the Badnik's grip was just too strong, despite his struggles he was slowly and relentlessly forced inside the access port. Tail's mind raced, a terrible nightmare was being realized, he was going to be trapped inside a Badnik!

With the fox safety forced inside the chamber, the access port closed, trapping him. Sonic had fulfilled an important part of her new role as a Badnik, she had successfully betrayed and captured her former friend, and enslaved him to her Masters service. The fox would serve well as her organic battery, ensuring she was fully powered, better able to carry out Eggman's will.

>>Organic battery successfully installed.

>>Unit fully operational.

>>Begin default program...listing objectives:

>>Obey Master Eggman.

>>Protect Master Eggman.

>>Capture enemies for conversion.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: It's one of her former friends

choices: ... let Sonic keep Tails and convert him into another Roller.
... bimbofy Tails, he has a more fitting Badnik form in mind.
... compromise, bimbofy Tails but then put her back in Sonic for Rollerfication.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman had, of course, been playing close attention to Sonic's actions after he released her into the world at large, and was pleased to see that she had claimed an organic battery. What surprised him, however, was who said battery had turned out to be.

He was torn. On one hand, Sonic had the same systems inside her as her own former shell, and she would now be converting Tails into a new Badnik just like herself. This, along with Tails' capture in the first place, was a net positive for him. However, the fox boy had potentially valuable information in his head, and he wasn't sure if he wanted to make everyone into a Roller... it would be much more fun, and smart, to put Tails through the same Bimbo-Badnik-Brainwash process as his friend, and make him into a Balkiry or Buzzbomber or something else that flew.

Deciding to take the Badnik and her captive off the board until he made a decision, Eggman called her back to his lair, watching as she waddled slowly toward his fortress. Even with his uncertainty, that was a sight that would always bring a smile to his face.

Her movement was so slow that, by the time she made it back to him, he had already come to a decision. He would...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman orders the unit to report to him

choices: Eggman reveals his plan for Tails first
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman was eager to test the efficiency of his new bimbofication process on another test subject, and Tails would certainly provide some useful information. The fox was certainly smart, way smarter than Sonic, who in all honesty had succumbed to the process rather quickly. As any scientist knew, more information was always useful!

But first, he needed to extract the fox from his current duty, as Sonic's organic battery. Fortunately the Roller was fully charged, and could run on emergency power for the immediate future.

As the Roller waddled into his laboratory, Eggman was ready to begin the process.

He ordered Sonic to get ready to eject her organic battery, and stand by to restrain the fox if required.

Meanwhile, what had started out as a nightmare for Tails had quickly become something entirely different. Sure he was crammed in a small space, had been reduced to fuel for one his enemy's creations, and had a poor chance of being rescued. Yet, it seemed somehow tolerable, even maybe pleasurable. Tails had no way of knowing that even in this short time, the conversion systems built into the Roller had already started to affect him, burrowing into his mind and preparing him for his eventual conversion. He did however notice when he was removed from his comfortable confinement, and dumped unceremoniously on the floor.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: ... bimbofy Tails, he has a more fitting Badnik...

choices: Eggman keeps the drain going, reducing Tails to bimbohood immediately
Eggman stops it for now, and prepares Tails for further changes.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman just couldn't resist an opportunity to gloat, and as the helpless fox was picked up, and strapped down to a table, he grinned, laughing as he waited for Tails' daze to fade.

The table was cold and hard, and the restraints tight and uncomfortable against his wrists and ankles... it made him miss the comfy prison he'd been trussed up in just a moment before... Still, his head stopped swimming as Eggman walked over, petting the strangely-coloured Roller on the head as he did so... Tails wasn't sure why, but those colours... he knew they should mean something, but he wasn't sure what...

"W-what do you want, Eggman?" He asked, looking up at the mad scientist.

"What do I want? What about what you want, fox boy? I'm betting at this moment, you'd like to crawl back inside that Roller and curl up, wouldn't you?" He smirked. Tails gulped, cheeks flushing brightly at the madman's words. "I don't blame you, Tails... I designed this new generation of Badniks with user comfort in mind... It's okay to admit that you want to be contained within one now..."

"N-no! No, I don't!" He protested, as much to his own desires as to Eggman. The human simply shook his head, enjoying the boy's helpless resistance. "I don't want to be a Badnik!"

"Oh, but you will... I think you might already want it... but once you've been inside one of my new Badniks, not only will your mind become more and more like that of a good, brainless Badnik, but gradually, your body will be remodeled into a Badnik shell yourself."

"Y-you've got not chance of getting me back into that think now that you've told me that!" Tails yelled. True, the urge to snuggle up in a Badnik like a good slave was strong, but knowing that such a grisly fate awaited him if he did was more than enough to overpower that feeling.

"Oh, I have. At this point, the gloating is more for my benefit... by the time I let you off that table, you won't remember this conversation... You see, Tails... your mind is a very valuable thing. As much as I am loathe to admit it, your intellect rivals my own. And that brilliant, brilliant brain is something I can't afford to lose... so I'm going to give you a little bit of a brain drain, and once that's sorted, the fun can really begin."


Before Tails could protest any further, a helmet landed on her head, a visor covering her eyes. It was wired into one of the mad doctor's computers, as he strode over to it and warmed the device up. "Oh, and before you go, Tails... your new Roller buddy used to be just like you... before she went through the same process that you're about to... She used to be Sonic!"


Horror filled Tails, for just a moment, before the helmet warmed up and his thoughts went numb. Memories and knowledge washed away, pulled out of his mind and into Eggman's computer. It was as if the scientist and pulled the drain plug out of his brain, and now his years of experience and learning were flushing down the sink. And the strangest part was that it felt good! It flooded his addled brain with the same warm, fuzzy, comfortable feeling that being trapped inside the Roller- inside Sonic, he thought with a slight giggle- had given him. A dumbstruck smile appeared on his face.

Eggman watched and laughed... he was going to have fun turning the fox into a bimbo. Maybe he'd even keep the result around as a pet for a while, before shoving her into a Badnik for the transformation! Still, as he monitored the screen, it was clear that the sum total of Tails' intellect and most of his relevant memories were now his. The fox on the table was little more than an average teenager in intelligence and experience now... Save for a growing desire for life as a Badnik...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman reveals his plan for Tails first

choices: Tails begs Eggman for Badnik conversion
Eggman has something he wants first
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
There was no need to take any chances this time, the mad doctor reasoned. It was time to make the fox a true bimbo!

Turning the machine to full power, Tails remaining intellect drained away quickly, and the bodily transformation started.

The fox's hips became slender, legs more shapely, and facial features began to soften. Tails' chest swelled rapidly, as large and firm breasts appeared. Further bodily changes were hidden from view, as the machine automatically placed a Eggman empire uniform on her new body.

The process soon completed, and the machinery shut down, leaving the result on the table.

The newly made bimbo stood up, and looked over her body. She was a perfect bimbo, from top to bottom, clad in her new Eggslave uniform.

Slowly her mind cleared, she had some hazy memories of the past, of discomfort, constant strife and general unhappiness. But then something wonderful had happened, she had been lucky enough to be selected to experience a new life, a life of comfort, happiness and pleasure, a useful life serving a greater purpose.

She spotted the Badnik in the corner that had made it all possible, the Roller was standing patiently awaiting orders, like a good slave. She wanted to be just like that, a good slave for her Master, a good Badnik.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman keeps the drain going, reducing Tails to...

choices: Eggman is a little disappointed that he didn't get to 'train' her like Sonic.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Tails let out an empty-headed moan, bowing for her Master.

"Like, Master, I wanna be a cute lil' Badnik!" She giggled, before pointing at Sonic. "Just like her!"
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Tails begs Eggman for Badnik conversion

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman smiled, it seemed this machine was a bit more effective than he had dared to hope. In a matter of minutes it had reduced a brilliant young fox to a brainless bimbo, who was already begging to serve him!

Eggman was a little disappointed that he wound't be able to have as much fun with his new slave as he had with Sonic, but there was still some way she could provide amusement.

"Well my dear" He said. "Just what sort of Badnik would you like to be?"

Tails only smiled dumbly, it seemed she was trying to think, but simply couldn't decide.

Fortunately Eggman had a plan, and now spoke again. "In the next room, you will find many different Badniks, why don't you pick one?" He suggested. "Then prove your devotion to me but allowing the Badnik to capture you, and become its organic battery." He explained.

Tails seemed excited by the idea, her tails wagged happily and she squealed with delight.

"If you serve me well, I may allow you to be converted into an pure Badnik, just like your friend over there!" Eggman added.

The bimbo was delighted, she remembered how comfortable and safe she had felt inside a Badnik previously, and couldn't wait to try it again! She would prove herself a good slave to her Master, longing to join her friend and be given the honour of being converted to a pure Badnik.

She rushed off through to the next room, and sped through the door, hearing it clang shut behind her.

The room was large, and seemed to contain just about every one of her Master's Badnik models. Buzzbombers sped through the air, while Caterkillers crawled slowly along the floor, in a large water tank in the corner, Jaws and Choppers swam. A huge number of other Badniks moved to and fro, waiting on the will of their Master.

Upon entering the room, all the nearby Badniks locked their vision onto her. They made no immediate move to attack, but it seemed that they may not wait long. Tails looked around, it seemed that she should make her mind up quickly, or a Badnik might decide for her!

Then again, who was she to decide which Badnik she had the pleasure of being imprisoned inside? It might be more fun to wait and see which one claimed her first...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman is a little disappointed that he didn...

choices: Eggman sends the Buzzer on patrol with the former Sonic
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The Badniks ran their visual sensors over the fox girl that has entered the room, quickly detecting the greater than usual amount of chaos energy present in her body. No doubt due to Tails former exposure to the chaos emeralds.

While their programming did not note her as an enemy, although she was clothed in a Eggman Empire uniform she was not designated as a superior unit. This fact, coupled with the chaos energy led the programming to an obvious conclusion, if the opportunity presented itself, capture and install as an organic battery.

Tails meanwhile was busily admiring the Badniks surrounding her, giggling to herself as she wondered which one she would be imprisoned inside.

The Bimbo gently petted a Slicer that was positioned to her left, running her hands along the sharp claws it could fling at enemies. It was certainly a potent foe for any of her Master's enemies, and she considered if she would make a good Slicer for her Master.

To her right, she noticed a Coconuts Badnik bouncing around. These Badnik's always seemed to have so much fun! Maybe she could have fun as a Coconuts too?

In front a Octus twirled its limbs, hovering for a short while. These octopus Badniks were so cute! The fox girl fawned.

She felt a sharp pain in one of her tails, and spinning around quickly, came face to face with the Crawl that had cheekily nipped her tail. The bimbo found it impossible to be mad at the Badnik, as it was simply too adorable.

Tails noticed that the Badniks were starting to close in on her, it seemed that her time was quickly running out, and she would soon be safely imprisoned, serving as an organic battery to her new Badnik owner. It was simply a matter of waiting to see who claimed her first.

Without warning, a Buzzer swept down from the sky, its stinger opening up into a grab, and seizing the fox girl securely. As the Buzzer lifted off with its captive, Tails admired the sleek design of the Badnik she would soon be imprisoned inside, she made no attempt to resist as the Buzzer flew away with her. It seemed that the Badnik needed to land before installing its organic battery, as it soon did. Tails' heart rate quickened, as excitement gripped her body, this was it, soon she would be safety encased inside a Badnik shell, reduced to a power supply for a mindless slave. Just as her Master had ordered.

She remembered what Master had promised, if she proved herself a good slave, he would convert her into a pure Badnik, just like the Roller that had captured her! Nothing but mindless servitude forever, and she couldn't wait!

An access panel on the back of the Buzzer between the twin engines opened up, and Tails was roughly shoved inside. It was dark, extremely cramped and smelled of oil, but to her it was pure bliss. With its organic battery safely contained and her energy now fueling its systems, the Buzzer took off once again. Reporting its status to Eggman's control system, it declared its fully operational capability.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Tails waits, and is captured

choices: It takes the form of a vixen in an Eggman uniform
It takes the form of a human woman instead.
Eggman ignores the AI's birth and focuses back on Buzzer-Tails.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The mad scientist watched his newest pet buzz out of the room, hovering obediently in front of him, and grinned. Though it was tempting to send her out into the world on patrol, especially since her brainwashing had been so forceful thather friends likely wouldn't be able to break her free even if they recaptured her, and even if they did, she wouldn't be able to defeat him with her useless bimbo body... he had another idea.

Ultimately, he was a scientist, and his curiosity was one thing that could never be quelled. Simply knowing that Sonic had been converted into a Badnik was not enough. He had to observe the process. After all, if there was one downside to the process, it was that Sonic was no more dangerous or effective than a common Roller now. Whereas before, she had been strong enough to break apart his armies, now she would be just a single cog in that great machine.

Perhaps, though, by observing the conversion step-by-step, in a controlled environment with no chance of losing her, he could see if there was a happy medium somewhere along the line. A hybrid of the Badnik's perfect obedience and ability to convert others into more of itself, and the devastating power its former self once wielded. A sort of "Super-Badnik". True, it was too late for Sonic, and seeing the complete change would mean the same for Tails, but if he got the procedure worked out, he could easily subject Shadow, Knuckles, and any of his foes' powerful allies or enemies to the same process. He could even abduct that obnoxious green Sonic and his conniving Tails-analogue if he felt the need to have a Sonic and Tails among his Super-Badniks.

Of course, he was getting ahead of himself. Until he saw exactly how the Badnik's internal roboticizer converted its victims, he couldn't know if such a hybrid was even possible.


There was also the matter of Tails' absorbed thoughts. The fox's memories and knowledge were something he had specifically made sure to absorb... but actually getting his computer to read them properly was hard. It, being a fairly unintelligent and non-sentient machine, was struggling to properly interpret the non-linear and non-logical thought patterns of a living being.

This was a demon of his own creation. He'd tried making intelligent robots in the past- Mecha Sonic, Metal Sonic, Brutus, Gemerl, and so on, but they had all betrayed him. Some of them thought they could do his job better than he could, some were a little too much like him, and the clash of egos had resulted in a schism, some simply had their own goals and used him as a means to further that. As a result, he'd sworn off intelligent machines for a while, and most of his subsequent builds were dull-witted and sycophantic. Loyal, and not smart enough to betray him, but at the same time, rock-stupid. He'd finally realised the problem with this after his failure with Mecha Sally. He'd, for a moment, had the brightest tactical mind completely slaved to his will, and he'd used her as a glorified attack dog. What's more, her close proximity to Sonic during most of her missions allowed him to eventually capture her, whereas if she'd been kept in his lair as a tactician, under several layers of mind control, he might've still had her.

He'd once again started working on smart robots, but so far, he'd had little success making them smart in a useful way.


An alarm snapped him from his thoughts. Another incursion.

He checked the monitors, and sighed. A low-priority attack in a low-priority area. The robots in that district would handle it easily. It had distracted him though... working on his plans and doing administration at the same time wasn't easy... he wished there was a way to split the workload.

What had he been thinking about, again? Oh, smart robots and Tails' memories, of course...

Inspiration struck, and Eggman grinned. If the issue was that he needed something to run his city, he needed a smart robot to understand Tails' absorbed knowledge and memories, why not solve both those problems with the same system... He could convert what he had of Tails into an AI. He'd been able to brainwash all of Tails with ease, let alone half of him! Better yet, he could fill in the gaps in the fox's knowledge with more loyalty to him!

Leaving Tails' body in her hovering tomb for a moment, he began to work on the computer, setting the programs to slowly build the AI.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman has another plan

choices: Sonic is now Robian version of her bimbo body, as a Badnik shell.
Sonic is a Roller, completely identical to the shell she has been inside.
Sonic is a hybrid of her bimbo body and the Roller's design.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
With Sonic now stuck inside the Roller, Eggman was ecstatic. The Badnik had been chosen well, it was the closest of all his designs to mimicking Sonic's actual abilities, and thus would be the easiest transition for both the physical and mental aspects of the change. Not only would the Badnik's attacks slot nicely into the little bimbo's muscle memory, but she already favoured the same ball attacks as her new shell anyway. It was the simplest possible conversion for her.

Of course, even a change that quick would take time, and he wasn't overconfident enough to just let his new creation roll off and get popped open by a Freedom Fighter before she was done turning into his newest pet. If that happened, they might actually be able to free her, and then this whole plan would've gone to waste.

No, the best option was to simply keep her by his side until such a time that the shell had done its work and she could be properly deployed.

Of course, without the necessary battle experience to aid her conversion, something might've gone wrong, so he shoved her into the simulator again, leaving her to spend hour after hour, day after day, watching herself as a Roller, fighting for her Master and taking out all of his enemies with her rolling charges.

She loved every second of it.

Eventually, it was time for the fallen hero to emerge from her mechanical cocoon. It had taken almost a week, with Eggman using his machines to lead the former Sonic's friends on a wild goose chase and make sure they never found a trace of the real Sonic, but the effort was worth it. Even seeing the glorious finalised form of his once-nemesis would be worth it, let alone getting to command her as his loyal minion. All that training and conditioning, all paying off in his newest slave.

Finally, he brought the Roller out of the training room, and opened the shell, eager to see what was inside.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman keeps the Badnik close by during Sonic...

choices: Eggman keeps the Roller as a trophy
Eggman sends the Roller to join all his other Badniks
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman quickly ran a handheld scanner over his new minion, impatient to see how well the process had worked. The scanner bleeped quietly, and Eggman's grin spread wider as the screen showed no trace of organic matter.

The new Roller was 100% machine, the physical process had worked perfectly.

Eggman now needed to test the other part of the conversion, had the mental conversion worked correctly?

But first the new Badnik needed something, like all others of its kind it needed a power supply. Luckily Eggman had a supply of suitable animals, and quickly selected a flicky. He roughly shoved the bird inside the Roller, and slammed the access port closed.

"Organic battery successfully installed, this unit obeys Master Eggman" the new Rollers computer generated voice crackled as the Badnik came online.

Eggman now plugged his scanner into the Badniks diagnostic port, and called up the programming files. He eagerly inspected the files, curious to see the contents. But he found nothing other than the standard AI for a Roller Badnik, there were no other traces of anything, no memories beyond the Badniks recent activation, and most importantly to him, no sign of any part of the former hero.

It seemed wrong to Eggman to refer to the new Badnik as Sonic. As no trace of the former remained, Sonic was simply a Badnik now, no different than any other.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic is a Roller, completely identical to the ...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman grinned, and sent the Badnik on its way. A Roller with the mind of Sonic the Hedgehog in it, even if it was just a trace, would've been worth something. Either as a trophy to taunt and listen to the hedgehog's dimwitted praise in response for the rest of time, or as a hostage to keep the Freedom Fighters off his back.

But this wasn't that anymore. It was just a Roller. No more, no less. No value to it beyond being a simple front-line soldier. It could trundle off and get itself scrapped for all he cared. All that mattered was the death of Sonic's identity and his victory.

He did, however, make note of the Badnik's designation. He was looking forward to the day that Roller got destroyed and he could announce just where that particular Roller had come from.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman sends the Roller to join all his other B...

choices: Eggman has a task for the new unit
Eggman wants to keep the unit nearby for a while first
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman was a little surprised at the new Badnik inside of the shell, as he wasn't really sure what to expect.

It seemed to be some sort of hybrid, it looked like a Roller, but was clearly very feminine in design. Eggman mused, it looked like some sort of Bimbo Badnik?

Shrugging, Eggman decided he might as well see if the Badnik actually worked.

Grabbing a organic battery from a nearby cage, Eggman inserted it into the waiting Badnik, and closed the access door.

The new Badnik came online, and for the first time, Sonic beheld her new form.

She looked great! The fallen hero was so happy that her Master had been true to his word, she was a pure Badnik at last!

Eggman grinned as he watched the new Badnik look at itself in the shiny metallic wall nearby. It would seem that his former adversary's memory had survived the process, and the new Badnik was pleased with the outcome.

The Badnik began to roll around the area, practicing the attacks she had learned from the simulation. It seemed she would be a most useful slave!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic is a hybrid of her bimbo body and the Rol...

choices: Eggman starts messing with Sonic's head a little, for his own amusement.
Eggman decides to make another Bimbo-Badnik, and wants Sonic to help.
Eggman decides to do a little more remodelling of his new pet.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman wasn't about to just let his new creation out of his sight, however. She was new and strange looking among his creations, and if the Freedom Fighters decided to try and see just what was up with her, he could lose her forever.

He had his computers take a scan of her body, and uploaded the results to his factories. They would soon begin producing a horde of identical units. Then he could mass deploy them and once the Freedom Fighters were assured that there was nothing unique about his new models, he could let Sonic go and live out her fantasies for real.

For now, she would be his pet, and bodyguard. And while Sonic was slightly disappointed that she wouldn't be capturing more foolish people to make into lovely badniks like herself, the honour of guarding her Master eclipsed that entirely.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman wants to keep the unit nearby for a whil...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Since this little project had been such a success, Eggman reasoned that it made perfect sense to try it again on another of Sonic's former friends.

There were a few complications however, he couldn't just capture one and shove them inside a Badnik, as amusing as that usually was. No, the key difference here was that Sonic wanted to become a Badnik. The doctor knew he had only achieved this by carefully manipulating the hedgehog, corrupting and shaping her thoughts until she begged her former enemy to enslave her.

It might not be possible a second time.

Eggman grinned as a thought jumped into his mind, he could get the former hero to help with the process! That ought to speed things along, and see just how effective his new minion could be.

Summoning the former hero to his presence, Eggman outlined his plan. For her part, the new Badnik was only too pleased to help.

But first Eggman needed to pick a target...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman decides to make another Bimbo-Badnik, an...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
With the top priority enemy now his bimbo-bot slave, it was tempting to aim for one of the other two highest-priority targets. Either would be a fun conversion, and it would be interesting to see how well it worked on people smarter than the book-dumb, reckless Sonic.

Of course, he'd also have to choose compatible Badnik bodies. Several of Sonic's friends would also be viable Rollers, but most of them would need new shells. He entered the details of each of them, compiled from his own files and the memories he had downloaded from Sonic during her brainwashing, and loaded them into the Badnik Compatibility Program, and it gave him some interesting results...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Another target?

choices: Send the usual squad of Badniks
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman grinned as he looked at the computer generated simulation before him, this was certainly a intresting idea!

Sonic's former friend had been a pain for him in the past, and Eggman had to grudgingly admit that the fox's intellect rivaled even his own at times. He would look forward to draining that intelligence, until only a air headed bimbo remained.

Given the fox's love of flying, a buzz bomber seemed a logical choice for him, and would make a great addition to his new line of Badniks.

Eggman had enjoyed Sonic's eventual transformation into his willing slave. The process was so effective that she had even begged him to turn her into a Badnik!

The only question remaining was how to capture the fox?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Tails the Busty Buzzbomber

choices: "Put him straight into the VR Training Sim." (Brainwash first)
"Let's change him into her." (Female body first)
"Strap him down and wait for him to awaken."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman smirked as a plan formed in his mind, he knew just how to exploit Tails' curiosity...

***

The next day, as Tails conducted a routine investigation for any Badnik activity in the area, he caught a flash of metallic blue and red. He froze, for a moment thinking he was alone with Metal Sonic, but he didn't hear the roar of the mechanical hedgehog's engine, so it couldn't be him...

Carefully, he moved toward the robot, and spotted a strange, mostly-Mobian shape running away. He followed, chasing after the retreating machine as he tried to get a better look at it. As it ran, it led him deeper and deeper into the forest, further away from any chance of backup, but he remained focused on the robot. He couldn't lose it now.

Suddenly, to his surprise, it turned around, and gave Tails a good look at it.


"What the heck, Eggman..." Were the only words he could form. Before him stood the figure of a large-chested, curvacious woman, but her head was that of a Roller, and she had a dome-shaped shell on her back. She looked at him with glowing pink optics, and let out an excited giggle, before curling herself up as her shell extended to encircle her, and she barrelled straight into him.

Thrown against a tree, Tails slumped to the ground, out cold. With a happy chime of "Mission Accomplished!", Sonic scooped him up and carried him back to Eggman's lair.

***

Well done, Sonic." Eggman smirked, petting the bimbo on the head. He'd have to get around to renaming her at some point, but for now, he had a bimbo-badnik to make. He looked down at the unconscious fox, and gave Sonic her next command.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Use "Sonic" as bait

choices: Continue the tests for now, to make sure the brainwashing holds.
He's satisfied, time for her first mission.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic stood at attention beside her former friend, as the simulation ended. Her suit, however, remained intact. The walls of the chamber were relfective enough that she could see her new, mechanical body. She was beautiful. Not on the conventional sense, but as a machine, she was a masterpiece. She felt more than comfortable in her new prison. It was made for her, after all. This Badnik had been made to be her, and it would be bad form to reject such a loving gift... The other mind controlling hers was soothing her, washing away her concerns and worries and wrapping her brain in a layer of cotton wool, so thick that thinking was like moving through molasses, but so comfortable and warm that she didn't want to bother thinking, just relax, submit, and obey. Obey her Master.

"Are you ready, Sonic?" Eggman asked.

"Master, she wishes to stay like this." The shell droned. It spoke with her voice, using her mouth and vocal chords, but she wasn't the one speaking. Sonic had no control over herself anymore. She felt the insides of the shell against her body, massaging her most sensitive areas, but otherwise, her motor functions, her voice, her eyes, all of them were the Badnik's now.

"Oh, really now?" Eggman grinned. "Excellent, my next-generation Cybernik project has been a complete success..."

Sonic heard the word "Cybernik", and realised what she was dealing with now. THe Cyberniks had been a special class of Badnik that even she hadn't been able to destroy. They were completely indestructible, and the only reason she hadn't bee defeated by them years ago was that the two test subjects were too powerful to contain and went rogue. Now, it seemed as though her Master had perfected the process. He'd brainwashed her, stripping her will away to leave her wanting to be his servant. Even if she didn't fall under the suit's control, she would still obey.

Eggman looked down at his saluting slave, and grinned.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic wants to remain like this

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
"Excellent news." Eggman smirked, petting his new Cybernik slave on the head. "Are you ready for your first mission?"

"Yes Master." The robot saluted. Sonic felt her arm move her heels click together, sighing in bliss as her body was manipulated by the armour, controlling and commanding her every movement.

"Good girl..." He grined. "You shall begin by increasing the number of Cyberniks. Start with..."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: He's satisfied, time for her first mission.

choices: ... Master." (The Badnik brainwashing from the simulation is complete)
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic stared down at the metal remains of the Badnik, unable to take her eyes off of it. Being encapsulated within it was so comfortable... She could just relax in her cosy shell and let the robot do everything for her, including think! It was so simple to just slip into a sleepy trance and obey all of her Master's orders.

She wanted it. She wanted to be Badnik.

Sonic looked up at the window where Eggman's silhouette was visible, and blushed.

"I would like to go back to being a Badnik..."
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic wants to be a Badnik again

choices: Sonic picks a fast and powerful Badnik
Sonic picks a slow and weak Badnik
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman's smile corrupted into a huge grin as he listened to the words Sonic had just spoken.

Sonic blushed harder as Eggman looked down at her from the screen. "Tell me exactly what you want, my dear." Eggman said. "Don't be shy."

Sonic looked up hopefully, and overcoming her shyness spoke. "Thank you for showing me the pleasure of serving you, Master." She said. "It felt so good to be a lowly slave of your empire, I was foolish to not realise this years ago."

She composed herself, and then spoke again. "I beg of you, Master, please make me a Badnik again!"

Eggman waited a few moments, enjoying his nemesis wilfully surrendering completely. Sonic waited for her master to speak again, she hoped that he would be kind enough to grant her wish.

"Very well." Eggman finally spoke, granting permission. "You may proceed to the Badnik processing centre, the robots there will help you!"

Sonic felt a wave of relief sweep of her body, along with a tingle of excitement. Soon she would be safely enclosed in a Badnik shell, and her desire to be a lowly slave of her master would be realised.

Sonic followed the path out of the building, and was directed to the Badnik processing area by an Eggpawn. Her excitement growing, she rushed there as quickly as possible.

Arriving at the plant, she watched with interest as captured animals were herded into the processing machine. Many looked afraid, but she knew there was no need for fear, soon they would be devoted slaves of Eggman, and she couldn't wait to join their ranks as a Badnik.

Eventually she reached the front of the queue, and the Eggpawn running the operation ordered her to halt and state her business. Her excitement running over, she saluted smartly, and spoke quickly. "Sonic the hedgehog, reporting for Badnik conversion, as ordered by Master Eggman." She stated.

The Eggpawn processed the information, then stated. "Additional parameters required, Lord Eggman has stated you may select the type of Badnik conversion."

Sonic paused for a moment, she had expected that her Master would select a Badnik shell for her, but it seemed that she now had the chance to pick her own. She smiled happily, this would be a great chance to pick a Badnik that was pleasing to her Master!

choices: ... a Crabmeat! It suited her in the simulation, after all!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic stood at the machine, pondering her options. Part of her wanted to make it up to her Master in any way she could. Turn herself into the most powerful, quickest machine on the list and do just as much to help her Master as she had done to harm him in her past life. But at the same time, she loved the way her slowly-scuttling Crabmeat body had felt. After so long running everywhere and fighting all the time and never sitting still, relaxation and rest felt so good. She considered all those that her speed had harmed, not just her Master, but her relationships with her friends and family, people she had never fully appreciated, people she had pushed away because she couldn't wait around, she always had to chase that next adventure. Had her speed ever been good? She was starting to have her doubts... After all, what good would her unstable, volatile self be to a Master who wanted, no, needed dependable, methodical servants?

Maybe this called for a completely new Sonic. A slow Sonic. A Sonic who was steadfast and always attentive. She would always be right where her Master needed her. She would fix the relationships she destroyed by seeing her friends hypnotically coaxed into sharing her fate. A family and obedient Badniks serving Master. And not only would her old friends and family love the new, slow Sonic, but so would all her brother and sister drones. She would be perfect, she would be part of Master's engine.

She would be slow.

Sonic looked at the screen in front of her, mulling over the options, eliminating anything quicker than a slow crawl. Gradually, she eliminated more and more, until she had her decision. She would be...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic picks a slow and weak Badnik

choices: Crabmeat is ordered to patrol the base
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic had enjoyed being a Crabmeat so much, she just had to make it permanent! She made her final selection, and her excitement grew at the prospect of once again being safely crammed inside a Badnik shell, enslaved to her Master's will forever.

The machine started up, and Sonic stepped onto the conveyor belt, swiftly being whisked into the heart of the machine. She did not resist as she was curled up tightly, and placed into a waiting Crabmeat Badnik. Sonic took her last breath of free air, as the Badnik shell was sealed shut, and the AI came online.

Once more she drank in the pleasure of submission as the Badnik programming merged with her mind. She obeyed Master, nothing else mattered.

The new Crabmeat scuttled out of the exit door, and took its place with the other completed Badniks. Inside Sonic settled herself into her home, she was comfortable and content, but looked forward to carrying out her orders like a good slave.

Sonic knew she would make a good Badnik, and hoped that her friends would soon join the Badnik ranks of her Master.

Sonic was so happy inside Crabmeat. The Badnik scuttled along slowly and awkwardly, patrolling its route around Eggman's base. After all her time dashing around, never having time to stop and rest, Sonic was finally at peace. Crabmeat was so slow, it took hours to travel even short distances.

She was enjoying her simple existence as the lowest of Eggman's slaves, once she had been different, special, and had all the problems that came with that role. Now she was just a lowly slave, no different to any other Badnik.

She was always pleased to receive orders, and to obey her Master. Sometime she was sent further afield to help capture new prisoners. If they was lucky, some might become Badniks like her!

She didn't know what had happened to her friends, but she hoped they had been lucky enough to share her fate.

Unfazed by this, the automaton continued to walk the last path it had been given, patrolling around the base, watching out for anything hostile to blast with its claw-cannons.

Inside, Sonic was still conscious, still curled up in her comfortable cocoon...

As Sonic sat in her comfortable pod, she began to notice that Master's orders weren't arriving anymore. In fact, she hadn't seen a single message from him in weeks now! Where had he gone? Did she do something wrong? Did he not care anymore?

Weeks turned to months, months turned to years, andstill she heard nothing from her Master. She tried to distract herself with her shell's work, but it was hard to enjoy the same labour over and over again for this much time...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
As the Badnik numbers had increased, so Eggman hadn't needed to change patrol routes anymore. He had more than enough to spare. Soon, he reigned supreme overthe whole planet. Any who resisted had shared Sonic's fate, but he had taken special delight in his treatment of Sonic's closest allies.

All of them had been subjected to the same bimbotizing beam that Sonic had, and having the barely resisting sluts lined up in seats, watching a video feed of Sonic's conversion, just to rub salt into the wounds, had been more than satisfying after the long years of fighting and humiliation.

Only two of their number had escaped this. He had noted Tails' intellect, and thought it too useful to destroy, so he took the fox, and broke him, warping him until, where the innocent, friendly boy had been, there now stood a busty, evil assistant. She worshipped her Master just as much as she had once worshipped Sonic. Her entire life was dedicated to assisting her Master in his scientific endeavours, aiding him in perfecting his machines, making sure he could never lose his grip on the slave population he had worked so hard to build up.

This had lasted for all of two days, before Eggman realised she was smarter than him, threw a fit, and drained her intellect entirely, adding it to his own. With Tails now just as much a bimbo has her friends, if not moreso, he considered sending her to be turned into a Badnik now, but truthfully, he didn't really need any more Badniks. So instead, he kept her in his throne room as a brainless pet, her gloves and boots now resembling paws (Rendering her hands completely useless), her control collar now more resembling that of a dog or cat.

If Eggman had regretted one thing about losing track of Sonic, it was that he couldn't keep her as a trophy in his throne room. He had been forced to settle for the next-best thing: Princess Sally. True, Eggman didn't have the technology at point where he captured her, butit didn't take much more than a week to create, test, troubleshoot, and clear for use. During that time, the former royal had been locked in a darkened room, illuminated only by a large TV screen showing her Eggman Empire propaganda films, as the audio was blasted into her ears by the headphones she was forced to wear. Perhaps the old Sally might've resisted this, but under the effects of the Bimbotizer, she had little resistance left, and by day two,she was wholeheartedly believing everything she saw and heard, and singing along with the Empire's national anthem.

When he took her out of the room, she bowed, saluted, and pledged herself to obey him. He redressed her, not in the pink latex of a bimbo, but the more respectable standard uniform, before placing her on a golden pedestal, and commanding her to smile and salute. She obeyed, shouting "All Hail Eggman!" at the same time, before the machine activated and froze her body in that moment of obedient bliss for all eternity. He didn't know if she was still self-aware, and he didn't really care, but he knew that, if she did know what had happened to her, she'd be thanking him.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman has won, and she has faded into the crowd.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
One day, the Badnik shell containing Sonic stopped its slow scuttling. Its motors had packed up, its legs were hanging on by a wire or two, and the whole system was shutting down. Sonic gasped, realising that she was about to be trapped in a useless piece of scrapmetal, unable to help her Master at all!

Fortunately for her, however, the Badniks were designed to accomodate this. If ever the droid lost its ability to function, it would break open, allowing the occupant to be removed and placed in a new Badnik. Sure enough, the broken-down Crabmeat split itself apart, allowing her freedom for the first time in years. Slowly, she rose to her feet, stretching her body out.

"Mmm... I need a new shell."

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
To call her Sonic was something of a misnoma now. It was a long time since she had used the name, or thought of herself as Sonic. She really only knew herself as Crabmeat now.

Her mind hadn't ceased being altered after her imprisonment. The Badnik's own mind, simple as it was, was linked directly to hers, and she spent all day being constantly exposed to the Badnik's own stream of consciousness, which was mainly an endless repeat of its most recent directive. Even if this hadn't driven her stir-crazy, Eggman had included a more vicious function in the droid shell.

Part of the apparatus connecting her to the Badnik shell was a pair of earbuds, through which constant pro-Eggman propaganda was played. Eggman didn't just want to break her, he wanted to ensure that she worshipped him, but even this was not enough for him. The records were laced with a subliminal message, worming its way into her brain as she mindlessly drank in the repeated messages about the glory of her Master.

It told her, simply, that she was a Crabmeat. She would always be a Crabmeat, because Master wanted her to be a Crabmeat. She had no desire to escape her fate. She had no life outside of being a Crabmeat. If her Crabmeat shell was ever broken, she'd come straight back to the plant and install herself into a new one. She was a Crabmeat.


And after almost a month of lying in her prison, being told repeatedly that she was a Crabmeat, that Eggman was her glorious emperor and rightful ruler of Mobius, and all manner of other commands and messages, she started to believe them. After the second month, she believed them to be the absolute truth. By the third, the program had begun to eat away at her memories and her identity, breaking them down. By the fourth, Sonic was gone, and only Crabmeat remained.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Eggman looked out through the forcefield door that made up one of the walls of his cell. He cursed and grumbled as he sat on his bed, awaiting his judgement.

He wasn't quite sure how it had happened, but he'd lost. Despite having Sonic entombed in a Crabmeat for months on end, he had been overcome by the remaining Freedom Fighters, and captured. All of his robots had been deactivated and the Badniks had been opened. His empire was being dismantled, and coverage was on every news channel, which he was being shown on the TV in the cell. He had been put on trial and found guilty with little argument or defence, and the nature of his punishment was yet to be decided.

There was one small consolation prize, however: The fate of Sonic. It was the only other story on the news, and it warmed his blackened heart every time he saw the once-great hero's condition. The Freedom Fighters had certainly been in for quite the surprise when they'd cracked open Sonic's Crabmeat body and found her new self nestled within it.

The mad doctor had laughed uproariously at the sight of Sonic in the form of a very busty nude woman, scuttling around sideways on bowed legs, opening and closing her hands like pincers with the dumbest, empty look in her eyes, and he'd continued laughing right up until Sally's boot knocked the air from his lungs and Amy's hammer cracked his skull.

The Princess' fury had been a sight to behold. She had looked him right in the eye and told him that, if Nicole couldn't fix Sonic's mind, the she would be sorely tempted to have him publically executed, and she had half a mind to carry it out herself. He simply laughed, and told her to start practicing her swing, in that case, boasting that his program had shattered the supposedly-indomitable Sonic's mind, and that would be his victory.

That had been almost a week ago, and Eggman soon spotted Sally walking toward his cell.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
A safe distance away, Eggman sat in his Eggpod and watched the proceedings with a huge smirk on his face. Finally, a plan was working out correctly!

After a short while of seeing Sonic try, and fail, to walk in her new boots, he decided that the time was right, and hovered into view.

Looking up from the ground Sonic spotted Eggman as his craft slowly descended to the floor. "Eggman!" She shrieked, still not used to her new voice.

"Now that's a good look for you Sonic!" Eggman laughed at his adversary. Sonic tried to run over to Eggman, getting ready to wipe that smug look of his face, but just stumbled again, and fell over.

Eggman laughed harder, as Sonic stood up, and dusted herself off. "You'll pay for this Eggman!" She shouted.

Eggman continued to taunt Sonic, "Now, now, that's no way for a lady to behave!" He said. "Why don't you be a good girl and join my empire?" He asked, "You're already dressed for the part!" He giggled.

Eggman zoomed off, but quickly added "Come and see me at my base, when you're ready!"

As Eggman disappeared into the distance, Sonic started walking slowly forward, and after a little while found that she could now move around a little more easily. With a bit more practice, she was now walking in the boots quite easily. Soon her confidence grew, and she could move around freely.

Sonic set off towards Eggman's base, she would soon show the Doctor who was boss, and then she would make him undo this insult, she thought to herself.

As she travelled along, she stopped at a small stream briefly. Looking in the water, Sonic examined her reflection. She had to admit, the suit was stylish, and suited her new body well, it felt fantastic to wear. She was almost proud to wear it....

Sonic shook her head sharply, where had that thought come from? She needed to hurry up and get Eggman to reverse this.
