As Sonic reached the borders of Eggman's hellish city, she stopped, steeling herself for the incoming fight... and shortly realised that she had no idea how well she could fight in her new body. In fact, with her body constrained within the latex, her feet encased in high-heels, and her quills soft and flowing, she didn't think that any of her normal abilities would work. Heck, if she tried spinning, she'd probably smother herself with her new tits.

She didn't really have a lot of options. SHe could go in and just avoid fights, she'd learned to run, and it wasn't like she'd need her powers to introduce her heels to Eggman's stupid grinning face. Or she could go home and ask for help. Sure, they'd laugh for years afterwards... especially Antoine and Knuckles... Rouge and Amy would give her fashion tips... Cream would innocently talk about how pretty she was... She'd probably give Tails confusing feelings about his sexuality, knowing the poor kid's luck with crushes... But maybe Rotor and Nicole would help her...

Sonic shook her head. No point in dwelling on that now, she had a real problem right ahead of her, and no matter the option, it wasn't going to be fun. Steeling her nerves for the gruelling trip ahead, Sonic gritted her teeth, and...

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic considered that she could probably avoid enemies and traps if she was careful, so a stealthy approach was called for on this trip. She slowly made her way into the city.

Eggman's grinning logo greeted her, it was plastered on every building and most flat surfaces. The mad doctor was certainly egotistical, but that at least made him predictable in some sense. For example, Sonic spotted a large tower in the centre of the city, and knew that Eggman was bound to be located there. After all, where else would a egotistical mad doctor chose for his lair than the biggest and grandest building available. Eggman's ego could often be his downfall, a fact Sonic knew well.

As she made her way towards the centre of the city, she spotted a Badnik patrol approaching her. Not confident of her ability to fight in her new body, she ducked inside a building to wait it out.

Inside the building, she noticed cages filled with animals, and a production line. "Great" she exclaimed, a Badnik processing plant.

Sonic looked at the animals as she waited, she had spent most of her life rescuing them from Eggman. Yet they still seemed to get captured again and again, just like some others she could name. Strange thoughts came across her mind, maybe the animals were better off as Badniks? They were certainly less hassle, and they had a useful purpose then, even if it was serving Eggman.

Sonic shook her head again, why was she thinking these things? Was it something Eggman had done?

She ducked behind the cage as some of the Badniks from the patrol entered the building. It seemed they were there to crew the plant, and indeed this suspicion was confirmed when they proceeded to start up the machinery.

Sonic had a choice to make, should she try to attack the Badnik crew and save the animals? Or use the opportunity to slip away unnoticed?

She was unsure of her ability to fight, but she couldn't leave all the animals here, could she?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: ... rushed into the city.

Without any of the practice and skill she had with her old body, Sonic found herself being quickly overwhelmed by the robots, as they forced her down and stuck something to her forehead.

Immediately, an intense wave of relaxation passed over her. She moaned softly as she felt her body betray her, her resistance die. SHe didn't want to fight anymore. She wanted to obey. She would obey. She would obey these robots. Obedience was natural. Submission was natural. As the droids helped her stand, she caught sight of her reflection: Stuck to her forehead was a grinning Eggman emblem, the eyes swirling pink... just like her own eyes were. It was clearly some kind of mind control device. All she had to do was reach up and pull it off, then she would be free. But that would not be obedient. She had to be obedient. She would obey.

Sonic waited patiently as the machine got to work, first she was curled up tightly, until she could hardly move and held securely. She felt the cold embrace of the metal Badnik shell as it was clamped around her body, quickly being sealed shut.

She needed to obey, that was her role, she had been ordered to march into the Badnik processing machine, and she had complied.

Sonic was jolted from her thoughts as the completed Badnik moved off the production line. Viewing the world through the Badnik's optical sensors, she caught a view of her new form in a shiny metal surface.

She had been placed inside a Eggpawn Badnik. Sonic was pleased to see she had been honoured with this form, Eggpawns could complete many tasks, and she was sure she would be very useful to her masters.

In addition, the Eggpawns were designed to resemble Eggman, her glorious Master. It was truly an honour to share a form based on his appearance!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic becomes another Eggpawn.

choices: Sonic tries to escape from inside the Badnik
Sonic waits to see what happens
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Marching forward stiffly, the Eggpawn soon arrived before the other Badniks, and halted, awaiting instructions.

The leader of the Badniks examined the new unit, and noting that the process had completed successfully, deactivated the mind control unit still attached to Sonic's forehead.

"Carry out your assigned duties." The Badnik commanded. The Eggpawn obeyed, and marched away, beginning the process of preparing animals for Badnik conversion.

Inside the Eggpawn, Sonic felt her mind begin to clear, like someone had opened a window in a smoky room. Slowly her thoughts began to return.

Sonic awoke fully, and found herself curled up tightly, she tried to move, and found that she was contained somehow. She searched her memory for what could have happened, finding the period before she came round a blur. Thinking carefully, the mist began to clear, she had been overwhelmed by the Badniks! Panic began to set in as she realised she had been captured. There was something else, something else had happened that she couldn't quite remember...

Opening her eyes, she looked at the slight before her. A Eggpawn was visible in the reflection from the steel floor, it was herding animals into the Badnik processing machine. The Eggpawn was paying no attention to her, that seemed strange she thought, then she noticed the Eggpawn reach forward with its arms, but the view was all wrong...

Suddenly her memory returned, she wasn't looking at the Eggpawn, she was the Eggpawn! She was a Badnik!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: The Eggpawn begins its assigned work

choices: The Eggpawn has a way to suppress its battery.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: Sonic began to squirm and struggle against her bonds, trying to force her way out. She'd done it before. She could do it again.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic tries to escape from inside the Badnik

choices: Sonic decides to wait it out, for now.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic continued to struggle inside her prison, but the Eggpawn, undeterred, simply continued on with its work.

No matter how much she struggled, she was simply held too tightly to build up the necessary momentum to force herself free.

Clearly another method would be required if she was to escape.

Sonic was forced to watch as the Eggpawn continued to load the animals into Badnik processing plant, condemning them to suffer the same fate she had.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic keeps fighting.

choices: Sonic eventually discovers a chink in the armour.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The past ten minutes of struggling hadn't done her any good. If she wanted to get out, she'd have to find another way, and she wasn't going to do that by just constantly struggling.

All the while, she saw nothing except the actions of her prison in front of her, endlessly toiling to turn more innocent victims into slaves like her.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic decides to wait it out, for now.

choices: Sonic continues to fall under the Badnik programming.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
For the first time, Sonic was at a loss. She was completely trapped inside the Badnik, and didn't have any option other than to wait.

While the thought of being trapped appalled her at first, she did have to admit, the Badnik shell was strangely conformable. Indeed, as the hours began to drag on, she began to feel more and more relaxed. After all, she thought, there's nothing I can do at the moment, so why not have a rest?

Perhaps Eggman wasn't that bad after all? She could have suffered a worse fate...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic is completely trapped.

choices: Sonic starts to think less like a hero, and more like a Badnik.
Sonic starts to feel sleepier and sleepier in her comfortable bed.
Sonic realises what she's thinking and snaps out of it.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Yes... this wasn't so bad at all. She'd never been in a Badnik shell before, and hadn't realised quite how comfortable it was. She'd never paid the idea of being inside the mechanical minions much thought, she just assumed that she was doing the right thing all those years that she popped open Badniks and released their organic batteries.

And yet, if this Badnik was anything to go by, they were less like prisons, and more like comfortable beds. Very comfortable beds, even.

Yes, comfort was the correct word. She felt like she was lying on a cloud, not contained within some metal shell. She couldn't move at all, her body curled up in a tight ball, but whatever the machine's systems were doing to her, it was stopping her from getting cramp, or feeling numb, or anything like that.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic continues to fall under the Badnik progra...

choices: Sonic is roused from her trance.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic slowly drifted off into a blissful trance, she had never felt so relaxed, so carefree and happy.

With its organic battery successfully subdued, the Eggpawn was free to carry out its assigned work.

The Badnik toiled endlessly, a simple slave to the will of Eggman. It would obey any order without question and complete any task assigned, regardless of what it was.

Only one thing mattered to a Badnik, the will of Eggman.

Sonic had been the greatest hero the planet had ever seen, but now Sonic was nothing more than a power source, a simple battery for one of Eggman's lowest minions.

Occasionally she stirred in her sleepy trance, but the comfortable feelings swiftly subdued her again.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic starts to feel sleepier and sleepier in h...

choices: She is still in her Eggpawn body.
She is out of the body, sitting in front of Eggman.
She is on the ground, surrounded by the broken remains of her Eggpawn.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
She didn't know how long she'd been in her comfortable cocoon. She'd lost track of the time, she'd lost track of everything, except for the endless sleep and occasional flashes of her dull, monotonous, wonderful existence. After all, why did she need to know what the time was? As an Eggpawn, she had no need for breaks, to stop and rest or eat. She could just keep on working, forever. She was fairly shore that her particular Eggpawn shell didn't have a chronometer.

One day, however, she stirred from her dreamless slumber and realised that the comfortable tiredness that had kept her so cosy and safe was gone. She didn't feel the pull of the trance anymore, in fact, she felt awake.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic is roused from her trance.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content: While Sonic is out for a run, he stumbles across a mysterious factory, eventually stumbling onto a conveyor belt and getting trapped in one of the processing machines, Sonic is turned into whatever inanimate object the Factory needs!
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Sonic the Product

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
The day was bright and young as Sonic ran at top speed across the various mountains and forests in his path, a smile on his face as the wind blew past his face.

"Man this rocks! Eggman is missing, everything is blooming, I finally have time to go for a good run, while not being chased!" Sonic said as he was but a faint blue blur racing across the land.

Soon Sonic stopped atop a large moss covered structure, previously belonging to one of Eggman's massive metal machines, and took in a deep breath, admiring the fresh air.

"Man, what a good run, about time to head ba-" Sonic began to say before noticing a large factory of sorts off in the distance.

"That probably wasn't there before... Ugh, I should check it out..." Sonic groaned, bolting towards the factory faster than the speed of sound, instantly arriving at the gates to the factory.

Cautiously peering into the courtyard, he noticed odd, faceless androids of sorts standing slumped over and idle.

"Hmm... I don't know if this is an Eggman base or what, but I should check inside..." Sonic mumbled as he cautiously bolted it towards a partly opened rusy metal door on a wall of the factory and quickly skipped inside.

As he closed the metal door behind him, the faceless droids started to reawaken.

*Movement Detected. Rebooting.*

Soon enough, the dormant factory would be back to proper working order, along with its workers, unknown to Sonic at the moment as he cautiously looked around and moved throughout the dark interior of the factory, trying to let his eyes adjust to the darkness.

While Sonic wasn't aware of it yet, this factory actually belonged to...
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Yes Please!

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Sonic tip toed slowly through the dark building, being careful not to trip over anything, or disturb some sort of alarm system.

"Alright, just gotta find the lights for this place and I'll be able to properly take a look around." Sonic mumbled as he continued carefully treading around the facility.

Eventually, to his delight, Sonic was now at some sort of wall, and gently feeling around, felt a light switch. With a smile, he flipped it upwards, the lights to the factory all turned on with a humming sound, blinding Sonic for a moment as his eyes had to adjust to the sudden introduction of light.

As Sonic was recovering what was effectively a flashbang, the various faceless drones started to come to life around the factory, moving to their desired stations and starting up the various pieces of equipment, causing the various machines to make noises as they started up and got to work doing... whatever they were doing.

As Sonic finally got done rubbing his eyes, he got a good look at the drones that moved on past him, paying him no mind, getting a better look at them in general.

They were all very basic when it come down to things. Thin metal bodies, colored differently to each other, though with no usual legs, instead, their "Legs" were just simple mounts for their wheel, which was a simple sphere that also allowed them to turn. Their faces were blank, being nothing but a black visor for eyes. The stand out feature of these drones however were the fact they were very much based off of a womanly body structure.

Large spherical breasts were on their chest, and their midsection was thin. On their behind was a large bubble butt, with a port of some kind above it slightly. One of their hands was fashioned in the style of a crane-game styled hand, while the other was a tool of some kind, different between the drones. Screwdrivers, torches, brooms, they all had something different as their other hand.

CLAMP!

Sonic flinched as he felt something latch onto his arm. he was distracted and quickly tried to yang his arm free, but there was no budge. He looked at the drone that had a hold of him, and it was exactly like all the others, aside from its other hand, which was a.. tablet of some kind.

*ERROR! Drone does not meet standards. Repairs and corrections deemed 100% necessary! Relocating to Repair Station!* it drone as it forcibly pulled him along, despite his best efforts.

Sonic tried his best to pull against the drone's grip, but couldn't even slow the thing down. Quickly enough, the drone reached its desired location and in a surprisingly strong fashion, tossed Sonic into the machine, the hatch closing behind him.

Sonic landed on what felt like sand paper and groaned, trying to collect himself. As he got to a stand, he failed to notice the plethora of mechanical devices rushing towards him, ready to do their work.

But what will the machine turn Sonic into?
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Eggman!

choices: Many years later, The Drone is given some individuality.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Several ring-like objects forcibly placed themselves on Sonic's wrists and ankles before lifting him into the air despite his best struggles, forcibly holding him into an X formation. A camera lowered down in front of him and flashed him with a red light, causing him to wince.

*IRREGULARITIES DETECTED IN BASE! RECTIFYING!*


The camera lens then opened up, revealing a ray-gun of sort, aiming straight at Sonic's chest. Despite his best effort, he couldn't get away from the reticle as it soon blasted him with a yellow laser.

Not even a second after, Sonic's body began to shift. His waist turning impossibly thin as his hips widened out. His butt inflated many times over as his cock shriveled up and pulled itself inside his body, being replaced with the female equivalent.

Not too long after, large round boobs started to grow and inflate on his chest, causing a high pitched moan to escape her lips. Along with some face slimming, the transformation was complete, and Sonic was left breathing heavily as a result.

The Camera flashed red again, and this time a dinging sound could be heard.

*BASE CORRECTED! NOW STARTING WITH REPAIRS!*
It droned as it pulled away into darkness.

As Sonic was still gaining her bearings over what had just happened, Sonic felt something being clamped over her legs. glancing down, she noticed the same type of metal that was present on the other drones being place over her legs, which at this point, were pressed together. While a tight fit a first, the metals were successfully placed overtop her complete lower half and welded together seamlessly.

"STOP IT! LET ME GO!" She screeched in a desperate and fear filled tone, but to no avail, as the machine continued piling onto her, now her waist, tits, torso, and arms were easily squeezed into these mental casings, albeit her hands were encased in simple round spheres.

"NO PLEASE!" She squeaked out before a large spherical metal object was perfectly clamped over her head. it felt tight, yet, comfortable. She couldn't feel her quills through this thing! The rest of the suit was soon welded together, sealing her inside.

The rings that were previously holding her up finally dropped her, where she remained in a T Pose, despite her futile struggles.

*BASE PLATES SUCCESSFULLY REPLACED. NOW FINISHING PHYSICAL REPAIRS!*


Before Sonic knew what was coming to her, she felt a strong surge of electricity pump through her entire body, causing her to feel her entire interior began to morph and transform, melting away before reforming into various bits of metal and wires, her skin becoming the plating she was cased in, albeit now blue, her bones being turned to wires, and her blood shifting over to oil. Her Vagina even extending outwards into a new port on her front.

Even her brain wasn't safe as it was simply converted to a simple data cell, which was already nearing its capacity. And the spheres on her hands had 3 mental claws of sorts extend out of them, matching the hands of the other drones. What was once Sonic the Hedgehog was not physically no different than than all the other drones.

Sonic was very much dazed, and having significant trouble grasping at her thoughts due to the limited storage space in her data cells. Well, she would no longer have to worry about such things as a wire of sorts was plugged into her Vagina port and immediately she was frozen stiff, her mind being perfectly archived, deleted, and rewritten!

Designation: Sonic the Hedgehog.
Designation: Drone: #069.

Directive: Running and stopping Eggman..
Directive: Listening to orders and serving Master Eggman.

Date of Creation: June 23rd 1991.
Date of Creation: May 12th. 2020.

Desired Affections: Proactive Girls. Running. Saving the World. Friendship.
Desired Affections: Working at 100% Efficiency. Seeking World Domination. Serving Master Eggman. Keeping Busy.

Servitude Level: 0%.
Servitude Level: Infinity.

Body Type: Fleshy.
Body Type: Type 4: Indestructible, Unmovable Egg-Metal.


All Previous Designations are to be deleted. 3. 2. 1.

*DRONE: #069 ONLINE. MODEL UP TO DATE. REPAIRS: AFFIRMATIVE!*

With that, the doors to the repair station hissed open, letting her free.

*THANK FOR YOUR REPAIR! REMEMBER: DO YOUR DUTY! PRAISE EGGMAN!*


As it exited the repair station, the drone was identical to its many other sisters around itself. Large metallic breasts. Large round posterior. Sleek Design. And a trademark Eggman Logo on the spot above where her Vagina would have been if she were a simple woman, and her unique tool being that of another clawed hand, as well as a port where her Vagina would normally go. She was a slave for her master.

*STATE DRONE DESIGNATION.* A more advanced albeit still faceless drone said to her.

*DRONE IS FACELESS SERVANT OF MASTER EGGMAN!* She droned in response.

*ACKNOWLEDGED. CONTINUE WITH MANUAL DUTIES UNTIL DESIGNATED OTHERWISE! The Advanced Drone said.

*AFFIRMATIVE! HAIL EGGMAN!*

*HAIL EGGMAN!*

The 2 Drones bowed before wizzing off to do their own deeds. Due to her lack of a unique tool, the drone that was Sonic was automatically deemed unfit for most tasks, and simply laid dormant in a corner of the factory, watching the other drones go by her until she was called upon by a higher up.

This was her designation, from now until forever. An unremarkable, faceless Drone for her Master, Eggman. Hail Eggman.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Another Faceless Servant Drone

info.description:
Choose or create scenarios where you can turn the world's fastest blue hedgehog into a female.

Some rules to establish:

1. No death or killing off chars
2. It is a mostly TG story, but anything else can be allowed except for shrinkage, vore (unbirthing is an exception) scat/watersports, and WG.
3. Others can join in too, but keep it centered around Sonic
4. Sex is allowed. No gay/lesbianism.
5. Have fun!
